Qiu ni rang women yanchi dao yige linjin de ding qi, yibian women xiangying ni de haozhao, shuncong ni de shizhe.” Nandao nimen yiqian meiyou fashi shuo: Nimen jue bu hui miewang ma
Nimen ceng juzhu zai zi kui zhe suo zhu di difang, erqie mingbai wo shi zenyang chuzhi tamen de. Wo yi wei nimen dale xuduo bifang
Tamen que yi yong jimou, zai zhenzhu nali, you tamen de jimou (de guobao). Tamen de jimou, buzu yi yidong qun shan
Ni jue buyao yiwei zhenzhu dui ta de shizhe shuangyue. Zhenzhu que shi qiangda de, que shi cheng e de
Zai na ri, zhe dadi yao bian cheng bie de da di, zhu tian ye yao bian cheng wei bie de zhu tian, tamen yao chulai jian du yi de, quanneng de zhen zhu
Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian zui renmen daizhe zhigu, cheng shuang cheng dui di bei kunbang qilai
tamen de chenyi shi yong liqing zuo de, huo jiang longzhao tamen de lian
Yibian zhenzhu yiju ge ren suo xing de shan e er jiayi baochou. Zhenzhu que shi qingsuan shensu de
Zhe shi dui zhongren de chongfen de biaoshi, yibian tamen yinci er shou jinggao, yibian tamen zhidao ta zhishi du yi de bei chongbai zhe, yibian you lizhi de ren ji zhu
Ai lie fu, lia mu, la yi. Zhexie shi tian jing ──mingbai de “gulanjing” de jie wen
Buxindao zhe huoxu yao xiwang tamen yuan shi guishun de
Ni tingren tamen chihe wanle ba! Ni tingren tamen shou xiwang de youhuo ba! Yinwei tamen bujiu jiu hui zhidao de
Wo bu huimie yige chengshi ze yi, dan huimie ta, jiu you yige kezhi de ding qi
Renhe minzu dou buneng xian qi dingqi er miewang, ye buneng hou qi dingqi er lunsang
Tamen shuo:“Ceng feng jiang shi jiaohui de ren a! Ni que shi yige fengzi
Ni zen bu zhaoshi women yixie tianshen ne? Ruguo ni shi yige chengshi de ren.”
Wo zhi ping zhenli er jiangxia tianshen, dao na shi, tamen bu meng huanxing
Wo que yi jiang shi jiaohui, wo que shi jiaohui de baohu zhe
Zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqianle xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua gudai de ge zongpai
Meiyou yige shizhe lailin tamen ze yi, dan you shizhe lailin, tamen dou jiayi chaoxiao
Wo zheyang shi (aihao chaoxiao) shenru zui renmen de xin
Tamen bu xin wo de jiaohui, qishi, guren de changdao yi shiqule
Jiaruo wo wei tamen kaipi yidao tianmen, er tamen cong na dao tianmen jixu deng tian
tamen biding shuo:“Women de yanjing zhishi shou mengbi de, buran, women shi zhongle moshu de minzhong.”
Wo que yi zai tianshang chuangzaole (shi'er) gong, wo wei guancha zhe er xiushi tiankong
Wo baohuzhe tian, buxu renhe shou zuzhou de emo deyi qinru
dan qieting de emo ze you mingxian de liuxing gan shang ta
Wo zhankaile dadi, bing ba xuduo shanyue anzhi zai da dishang, erqie shi ge zhong junheng de dongxi sheng chulai
Wo zai da dishang wei nimen he nimen suo buneng gongyang zhe er chuangzaole xuduo shenghuo ziliao
Mei yi zhong shiwu, wo zheli dou you qi cangku, wo zhi yi kezhi de fenliang er jiangxia ta
Wo paiqian zirun de feng, wo jiu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yi gongji nimen yinliao, nimen jue bushi yushui de xu cang zhe
Wo que shi neng shi wanwu sheng, neng shi wanwu si de; wo que shi wanwu de jicheng zhe
Wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong xianjin de, wo que yi zhidao nimen zhong houjin de
Ni de zhu biding jihe tamen. Ta que shi zhi rui de, que shi quanzhi de
Wo que yi yong heise de chengxing de niantu chuangzaole ren
Yiqian, wo ceng yong liehuo chuangzaole jingling
Dangshi, ni de zhu ceng dui tianshenmen shuo:“Wo biding yao yong heise de niantu su chengren xiang er chuangzao ren
Dang wo ba ta su cheng, erqie ba wo de jingshen chui ru ta de suxiang de shihou, nimen yingdang dui ta fufu koutou.”
Suihou, tianshenmen yitong koutou
wei du yi bo lie si bu ken koutou
Zhu shuo:“Yi bo lie si a! Ni zenme bu koutou ne?”
Ta shuo:“Ni yong heise niantu su chengren xiang er chuangzao de ren, wo bu gai xiang ta koutou.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni cong zheli chuqu ba. Yinwei ni que shi bei fangzhu de
Ni bi zao zuzhou, zhidao baoying ri.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni dui wo huanxing, zhidao renlei fuhuo zhi ri.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni que shi bei huanxing
dao kezhi de riqi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ni yi panding wo shi mi wu de, suoyi wo shi bi zai da dishang yi zui'e youhuo tamen, wo biding yao shi tamen yitong mi wu
Chufei tamen zhong ni suo xuanba de puren.”
Zhu shuo:“Zhe shi wo yingdang weichi de zhenglu
Wo de pu renmen, ni dui tamen jue wu quanli, chufei naxie shuncong ni de mi wu zhe
Huo yu biding shi tamen quanti de yueding di difang
Huo yu you qi daomen, mei dao menjiang shourong tamen zhong bei pai ding de yibufen ren
Jingwei zhemen biding zai yixie leyuan he yuanquan zhi jian
nimen heping de, anquan de jinru leyuan ba!”
Wo qingchu tamen xiongzhong de yuanhen, tamen jiang chengwei dixiong, zai gao ta shang xiang dui er zuo
Tamen zai nali bu ganjue pifa, tamen jue bu bei zhu chu.§
Ni gaosu wo de pu renmen, wo que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
wo de xingfa que shi tongku de
Ni yingdang dui tamen xushu yi bo la xin de kerenmen de gushi
Dangshi, tamen jinqu jian ta, shuo:“Zhu ni ping'an.” Ta shuo:“Women que shi weiju nimen de.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao weiju, women dique yi yige congming de nanhai xiang ni baoxi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo yi laomai, nimen hai xiang wo baoxi ma? Nimen yi shenme xiang wo baoxi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women ping zhenli er xiang ni baoxi, suoyi ni buyao juewang.”
Ta shuo:“Chu mi wu zhe wai, shei hui juewang yu zhenzhu de enhui ne?”
Ta shuo:“Shizhemen a! Nimen you she me chaishi ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women feng pai qu chengzhi yiqun fanzui de minzhong
Lu te de jiazu chuwai, women que yao ba tamen quandou jiu chulai
dan ta de qizi chuwai. Women yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa.”
Dang shizhemen lai dao lu te de jiali de shihou
ta shuo:“Nimen que shi yixie mosheng de ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Buran, women ba tamen yixiang zhenglun de (xingfa) dai lai gei nile
Women ba zhenli dai lai gei nile, women que shi chengshi de
Ni yingdang daizhe ni de jiazu zai shenye chuxing, ni yao gen zai tamen de houmian. Nimen zhong de renhe ren ye buyao huitou kan. Nimen yingdang qianjin, yizhidaoda nimen fengming daoda di difang.”
Wo qishi ta zhe ge panjue: Jiushi zhe deng ren, zai zaochen jiang bei genchu
Cheng li de jumin xinran er lai
ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de keren, nimen buyao lingru wo
nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, nimen buyao xiuru wo.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao women meiyou jinzhi ni yu shiren wanglai ma?”
Ta shuo:“Zhexie shi wo de nu'er, ruguo nimen yao gan shenme shi.”
Zhi ni de shouming fashi, tamen bi jiang fanghuang yu ziji de diankuang zhi zhong
Nahan sheng zai ri chu shi xijile tamen
Wo jiu shi nage shi zhen tianfandifu, bing shi tao shixiang yudian ban jiangluo zai tamen shenshang
Duiyu neng kaocha zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Nage shi zhen que shi zai yitiao rengran cunzai de daolu shang de
Duiyu xindao zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Na conglin de jumin que shi bu yi de
guwo chengzhile tamen. Zhe liang ge difang dou zai pingtan de daolu shang
Shigu de jumin que yi fouren shizhemen
Wo ceng ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, dan tamen beilile ta
Tamen anquan de zao shan wei wu
dan nahan sheng zai zaochen xijile tamen
Tamen suo mouqiu de, duiyu tamen wujiyushi
Wo zhi ping zhenli er chuangzao tiandi wanwu, fuhuo shi shi biding lailin de. Suoyi ni yingdang wenhe di yuanliang zhongren
Ni de zhu que shi chuangzao wanwu de, que shi quanzhi de
Wo que yi shangci ni changchang fanfu songdu de qi jie jing wen he weida de “gulanjing”
Ni buyao jiyu wo suo shi tamen zhong ge deng ren suo xiangshou de shiwu, ni buyao wei tamen er bei'ai. Ni yingdang wenhe di duidai xinshimen
Ni shuo:“Wo que shi tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Na zhengru wo suo jiang shi fenpei zhemen de (dongxi) yiyang de
tamen ba “gulanjing” fenge cheng ruogan zhiti
Zhi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang tamen quanti jiayi shenwen ──
shenwen tamen shengqian de xingwei
Ni yingdang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng de mingling, erqie bi kai yi wu pei zhu zhe
Zai duifu chaoxiao zhe fangmian, wo bi shi ni manzu
Chaoxiao zhe chu zhenzhu wai hai chongbai bie de shenling, bujiu tamen jiu hui zhidaole
Wo que yi zhidao ni wei tamen de lanyan er fanmen
Ni yingdang zansong ni de zhu chaojue wanwu, ni yingdang yu zhongren yiqi koutou
ni yingdang chongbai ni de zhu, zhi dao na wuyi de xiaoxi lailin.§
Zhenzhu de mingling biding jianglin, suoyi nimen bubi yaoqiu qi zaori shixian. Zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de

Ta shi tianshenmen feng ta de mingling, xietong jingshen, jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren, shuo:“Nimen yingdang jinggao shiren shuo: Chu wo zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, suoyi nimen yingdang jingwei wo.”
Ta ping zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, ta chao hu tamen suoyong yi pei ta de
Ta yong jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren que turan bian chengle (ta de) mingxian de duishou
Ta chuangzaole shengchu, nimen keyi qi mao he pi yuhan, keyi qi ru he rou chongji, hai you xuduo yichu
Nimen ba shengchu gan hui jia huo fang chuqu chi cao de shihou, shengchu duiyu nimen dou you guangcai
Shengchu ba nimen de huowu tuo yun dao nimen xu jing kunnan caineng daoda di difang qu. Nimen de zhu que shi zhiren de, que shi zhi ci de
Ta chuangzao ma, luo, lu, yi gong nimen qi cheng, yi zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ta hai chuangzao nimen suo bu zhidao de dongxi
Zhenzhu fu zhishi zhengdao de zeren. Youxie daolu shi pian xie de, jiaruo ta yiyu, ta bi jiang nimen quanti yinru zhengdao
Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, nimen keyi yong zuo yinliao, nimen suo lai yi fangmu de shumu yin zhi er shengzhang
Ta wei nimen er shengchan zhuangjia, youganlan, ye zao, putao he ge zhong guoshi. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Ta wei nimen er zhifule zhouye he ri yue, qunxing dou shi yin ta de yizhi er bei zhifu de. Duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
(Ta you wei nimen er zhifu) tasuo wei nimen chuangzao yu dadi de gese wupin, duiyu neng jiqu jiaohui de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang

Ta zhifu haiyang, yibian nimen yu qu qizhong de xian rou, zuo nimen de shipin; huo caiqu qizhong de zhenbao, zuo nimen de zhuangshi. Ni kan chuanbo zai qizhong polang er xing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Ta zai dadishang anzhi xuduo shanyue, yimian da di dongdang, er nimen bude anju. Ta kaipi xuduo heliu he daolu, yibian nimen zunxun zhenglu
Ta sheli xuduo biaozhi, tamen jiezhu naxie biaozhi he xingsu er zunxun zhenglu
Nandao zaowuzhu tong buneng chuangzao de (ouxiang) shi yiyang de ma? Nimen zenme bu jiqu jiaohui ne
Ruguo nimen yao jisuan zhenzhu de enhui, nimen shi wufa tongji de. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Zhenzhu zhidao nimen suoyinhui de, he nimen suo biaobai de
Tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de buneng chuangzao renhe wu, er tamen shi bei chuangzao de
Tamen shi si de, bushi huo de, tamen bu zhidao chongbai zhemen jiang zai he shi fuhuo
Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de shi weiyi de shou chongbai zhe. Buxin houshi de ren, tamen de xin shi fouren de, tamen shi zi da de
Wuyi de, zhenzhu zhidao tamen suo yinhui de, he tamen suo biaobai de, ta que shi bu xi'ai zi da zhe de
Youren wen tamen:“Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Guren de shenhua.”
Yibian tamen zai fuhuo ri chengdan ziji de quanbu zeren, yiji bei tamen wuzhi di jiayi wudao zhe de yibufen zhongdan. Zhen de, tamen suo chengdan de zhen elie

Qian ren que yi yong jimou, dan zhenzhu ba tamen de jianzhu wu chedi jiayi cuihui, er tamen de wuding cong shangmian luo zai tamen de shenshang. Xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen

Ranhou zai fuhuo ri ta yao lingru tamen, bing shenwen tamen shuo:“Wo naxie huoban ──nimen weile tamen er yuxin shimen xiang zhenglun de ──rujin zai nali ne?” You xueshi zhe jiangyao shuo:“Lingru he xingfa jinri bi guiyu bu xindao zhe.”
Tamen zai zi kui de qingkuang xia, tianshenmen shi tamen siwang. Tamen biaoshi qufu, shuo:“Women meiyou fanguo shen me zui'e.” Buran! Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de
Tamen bei ya jin huo yu er yong ju qizhong. Zi da zhe de zhuchu zhen elie!§

Youren wen jingwei zhe shuo:“Nimen de zhu ceng jiang shi shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Ta jiang shi shan yan.” Xingshan zhe zai jinshi jiang xiangshou meiman de shenghuo, er houshi de zhuzhai que shi geng hao de. Jingwei zhe de zhuzhai zhen youmei
Changzhu de leyuan jiang ren sui tamen jinqu, naxie leyuan xia lin zhu he, qizhong you tamen suo yiyu de. Zhenzhu zheyang baochou jingwei zhe
Tamen zai lianghao de qingkuang xia, tianshenmen shi tamen siwang. Tian shen dui tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an, nimen keyi yinwei ziji de shanxing er jinru leyuan.”

(Bu xindao zhe) zhi neng dengdai tianshenmen lailin tamen, huo dengdai ni de zhu de mingling jianglin. Zai tamen zhiqian de ren jiushi zheyang zuo de. Zhenzhu meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen que kui wangle ziji
Suo yi tamen bi zaoshou tamen de xingwei de e bao, er tamen yixiang chaoxiao de (xingfa) jiang baowei tamen

Yi wu pei zhu zhe shuo:“Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, ze women he women de zuxian bu hui she ta er chongbai renhe wu, women ye bu hui shanzi jiechu renhe wu.” Zai tamen zhiqian de ren, ceng zheyang zuoguole. Shizhemen zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren

Wo zai mei ge minzu zhong, que yi paiqian yige shizhe, shuo:“Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu, yingdang yuanli emo.” Dan tamen zhong you zhenzhu suo yindao de, you yingdang mi wu de. Gu nimen yingdang zai da dishang luxing, yingdang guancha fouren (shizhe) de renmen de jieju shi zenyang de
Ruguo ni rewang tamen huode yindao, name,(ni de rewang shi turan de), zhenzhu bu yindao tasuo wudao zhe, tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe
Tamen zhi zhenzhu er fachu zui yanzhong de shiyan, shuo:“Zhenzhu bu shi siren fuhuo.” Buran! Zhe shi ta yingdang shijian de nuoyan. Dan shiren daban bu zhidao
(Ta jiang shi tamen fuhuo), yibian ta wei tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de shifei, bingqie rang buxindao zhe zhidao ziji yuan shi shuohuang de
Dang wo yao chuangzao yi jian shiwu de shihou, wo zhi dui ta shuo sheng “you”, ta jiu youle
Zai bei yapo zhihou, wei zhenzhu er qianju zhe, wo zai jinshi shi bi shi tamen huode yige youmei de zhuchu, houshi de baochou que shi geng da de, jiaruo tamen zhidao
Tamen shi jianren de, shi xintuo tamen de zhu de
Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle wo suo qishi de yixie nanzi. Nimen yingdang qingjiao shen ming jiaohui zhe, ruguo nimen bu zhidao
(Wo ceng paiqian tamen) daizhe yixie mingzheng he jingdian,(qu jiaohua zhongren), wo jiang shi ni jiaohui, yibian ni dui zhongren chanming tamen suo shou de qishi, yibian tamen siwei
Shiyong guiji yi zuo'e zhe, nandao bupa zhenzhu shi tamen sui dimian er xianluo, huo xingfa cong tamen liao xiangbudao di difang lailin tamen ma
Huo zai tamen de lutu zhong chengzhi tamen, er tamen jue buneng taobi
Huo zhujian chengzhi tamen, yinwei nimen de zhu que shi zhi ai de, que shi zhi ci de
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zhenzhu suo chuangzao de wanwu ma? Ge wu de yinying, pianxiang zuobian he youbian, wei zhenzhu er koutou, tongshi tamen shi beijian de
Tiandi jian de dongwu he tianshenmen, dou zhi wei zhenzhu er koutou, tamen bu ganzi da
Tamen weiju zai tamen shangmian de zhuzai, tamen zunxing ziji suo feng de mingling.※§
Zhenzhu shuo:“Nimen buyao chongbai liang ge zhuzai, ying shou chongbai de, zhishi yige zhuzai. Suoyi nimen yingdang zhi weiju wo.”
Tiandi wanwu zhishi ta de, shuncong changchang zhi guiyu ta. Nandao nimen she zhenzhu er jingwei ta wu ma
Fan nimen suo xiangshou de enhui dou shi cong zhenzhu jiangxia de. Ranhou, dang nimen zaonan de shihou, nimen zhi xiang ta qidao
Ranhou, dang ta jiechu nimen de huannan de shihou, nimen zhong youyibufen ren, like yi wu pei tamen de zhu
yizhi gufu tasuo shangci tamen de enhui, nimen xiangshou ba. Bujiu nimen jiu yao zhidaole
Wo suo gongji tamen de caichan, tamen yi qizhong de yibufen qu gongfeng naxie wuzhi de (ouxiang). Zhi zhenzhu fashi, guanyu nimen suo niezao de (shiwu), nimen bi shoushen wen
Tamen yi nu'er guizhenzhu ──zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu ──er yi tamen suo yuanwang de gui ziji
Dang tamen zhong de yige ren ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lian anran shise, erqie manfu laosao
Ta wei zhege ehao er bu yu zongzu huimian, ta duofang kaolu: Jiujing shi renru baoliu ta ne? Haishi ba ta huomai zai tu li ne? Zhen de, tamen de panduan zhen elie
Bu xin houshi zhe, you e li; zhenzhu you dianxing. Ta que shi quanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Ruguo zhenzhu wei shiren de bu yi er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bu liu yige ren zai dadishang, dan ta rang tamen yanchi dao yige dingqi, dang tamen de ding qi lailin de shihou, tamen bude yanchi yi shashi,(dang qi wei lailin de shihou), tamen buneng tiqian yi shashi
Tamen yi ziji suo yanwu de guizhenzhu, tamen wangyan ziji jiang shou zui jia de baochou. Wuyi de, tamen jiang shou huo yu de baochou. Tamen shi bei yiqi de

Zhi zhen zhu fashi, zai ni zhiqian, wo que yi paiqian xuduo shizhe qu jiaohua ge minzu, dan emo yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, suoyi jintian ta shi tamen de baohu zhe, tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Wo jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, zhi wei shi ni dui tamen chanming tamen suo zhenglun de (shifei), bingqie yi zhe bu jingdian zuowei xindao de minzhong de xiangdao he enhui
Zhen zhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, bian jie yushui shi yi si de da di fuhuo; dui shanyu tinghua de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang
Zai shengchu zhong, duiyu nimen que youyi zhong jiaoxun. Wo shi nimen de yin na cong shengchu fu nei de fen he xue zhi jian tichu de you chunjie you kekou de ruzhi
Nimen yong ye zao he putao niang zhi chunjiu he jiamei de jiyang, duiyu neng lijie de minzhong, ci zhong que you yi zhong jixiang
Ni de zhu ceng qishi mifeng:“Ni keyi zhu fang zai shanshang he shu shang, yiji renmen suo jianzao de fengwo li

Ranhou, ni cong mei zhong guoshi shang chi yidian, bing xunfu de zunxun ni de zhu de daolu.” Jiang youyi zhong yanse butong er keyizhi bing de yinliao cong ta de fu zhong tu chulai. Duiyu neng siwei de minzhong, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang

Zhenzhu chuangzao nimen, ranhou shi nimen siwang. Nimen zhong youren fu fan yu yisheng zhong zui elie de jieduan, yi zhi ta zai you zhishi zhihou you bian de yi wu suo zhi. Zhenzhu que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de

Zai jiyang shang, zhenzhu shi nimen zhong yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren, jiyang youyue zhe jue bu yuan ba ziji de jiyang rang ji ziji de nupu, cong'er tamen zai jiyang shang yu ziji pingdeng. Nandao tamen fouren zhenzhu de enhui ma
Zhenzhu yi nimen de tonglei zuo nimen de qizi, bing wei nimen cong qizi chuangzao ersun. Zhenzhu hai yi jiamei de shiwu gongji nimen. Nandao tamen xinyang xuwang, er gufu zhu en ma
Tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai (ouxiang), na shi buneng wei tamen zhuchi cong tianshang jiangxia de he cong dishang shengchu de yidian jiyang, erqie hao wu nengli de
Nimen buyao wei zhenzhuda biyu. Zhenzhu zhidao, er nimen bu zhidao.§

Zhenzhuda yige biyu: Yige nuli, buneng ziyou chuli renhe shiwu; yige ziyou ren, wo shangci ta youmei de jiyang, er ta mimi de he gongkai di jiayi shishe; tamen lia ren shi xiangdeng de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Dan tamen daban bu zhidao

Zhenzhu you da yige biyu: You liang ge nanren, yige shi yaba, shenme shi ye buneng zuo, que shi ta zhuren de leizhui, wulun zhuren dafa ta dao nali qu, dou buneng dai yidian fuli huilai; ling yige zou de shi zhenglu, ta quan ren zhuchi gongdao. Tamen lia ren shi xiangdeng de ma
Tiandi de youxuan zhishi zhenzhu de. Fuhuo shike de daolai, zhi zai zhuan shunjian, huo geng wei xunsu. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de
Zhenzhu shi nimen cong mu fu chusheng, nimen shenme ye bu zhidao, ta wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xinling, yibian nimen ganxie
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zai kongzhong bei zhifu de qun niao ma? Zhiyou zhenzhu weichi tamen; duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Zhenzhu yi nimen de jia wei nimen anju zhi suo, yi shengchu de pige, wei nimen de fangwu, nimen zai qicheng zhi ri he zhu dingzhi ri, dou ganjue qi qingbian. Ta yi mianyangmao, luotuo mao he shan yang mao gong nimen zhizao jiaju he zhanshi de xiangshou

Zhenzhu yi tasuo chuangzao de dongxi zuo nimen de zhe yin, yi qun shan zuo nimen de yinni chu, yi yifu gong nimen fangshu (he yuhan), yi kuijia gong nimen fangyu chuangshang. Ta ruci wancheng ta dui nimen de enhui, yibian nimen shunfu
Ruguo tamen weibei zhengdao, name, ni zhi fu mingbai di chuanda de zeren
Tamen renshi zhenzhu de enhui, dan jiayi fouren, tamen daban shi wang'enfuyi de
Zai na ri, wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong tuiju yige jianzheng, ranhou, bu xindao zhe bude wei ziji bianhu, ye bude xiang tamen taohao
Dang bu yi zhe kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen bude jianxing, ye bude huanxing

Dang yi wu pei zhu zhe kanjian tamen de pei zhu de shihou, tamen jiangyao shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zhexie shi women de pei zhu, women ceng she ni er qidao tamen.” Naxie pei zhujiang huida tamen shuo:“Nimen que shi shuohuang de.”
Zai na ri, tamen jiang xiang zhenzhu biaoshi qufu, er tamen suo niezao zhe jiang huibi tamen
Bu xindao erqie zu'ai zhu dao zhe, wo jiang yin tamen de pohuai er zengjia tamen suo shou de xingfa

Wo yao zai mei ge minzu zhong, tuiju tamen zu zhong de yige jianzheng, lai fanzheng tamen, zai na ri, wo yao tuiju ni lai fanzheng zhe deng ren. Wo ceng jiang shi zhe bu jingdian, chanming wanshi, bing zuo guishun zhe de xiangdao, enhui he xixun.§
Zhenzhu dique ming ren gongping, xingshan, shi ji qinqi, bing jin ren yinluan, zuo'e shi, badao; ta quan jie nimen, yibian nimen jiqu jiaohui

Dang nimen dijie mengyue de shihou, nimen yingdang luxing zhenzhu de mengyue. Nimen ji yi zhenzhu wei nimen de baozheng zhe, ze dijie mengyue zhihou jiu buyao weibei shiyan. Zhen zhu dique zhidao nimen de xingwei

Nimen buyao xiang nage fu ren, ta ba fangzhi de hen jieshi de xian you fen chai cheng ruogan lu; nimen yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan, yinwei zhe yizu bi na yizu hai yao fushu. Zhen zhu zhi yi ci shi kaoyan nimen. Fuhuo ri, ta bi wei nimen chanming nimen suo zhenglun de shifei
Jiaruo zhen zhu yiyu, ta bi shi nimen chengwei yige minzu; dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhenglu. Nimen shibi yao wei nimen de xingwei er shoushen wen
Nimen buyao yi mengshi wei huxiang qizha de shouduan; yimian zhan wen zhihou zai shizu, er nimen jiang yinwei zu'ai zhenzhu de dadao er changshi zaihuo, nimen hai yao shou zhongda de xingfa
Nimen buyao yi lianjia chumai zhenzhu de mengyue; zai zhenzhu nali de, duiyu nimen shi geng hao de, ruguo nimen zhidao
Nimen suoyou de shi yao hao jin de, zai zhenzhu nali de shi wuqiong de. Wo shi biyao yi jianren zhe suo xing de zuida shangong baochou tamen
Fan xingshan de nannu xinshi, wo shi biyao shi tamenguo yi zhong meiman de shenghuo, wo shi biyao yi tamen suo xing de zuida shangong baochou tamen
Dang ni yao songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, ni yingdang qiu zhenzhu baohu, yi fang shou zuzhou de emo de ganrao
Dui xindao erqie xinlai zhenzhu zhe, ta hao wu quanli
Ta de quanli zhi xianyu he ta jiao pengyou, erqie yi ta pei zhu zhe
Dang wo yi yi jie jing wen diaohuan ling yi jie jing wen de shihou ──zhenzhu zhidao ziji suo jiang shi de ──tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige niezao zhe.” Buran, tamen daban shi bu zhidao de
Ni shuo:“Shengling cong ni de zhu nali jiang shi zhe bu baohan zhenli de jingdian, yibian ta shi xindao zhe jianding, bingyong zuo gui xinzhe de xiangdao he xixun
Wo dique zhidao, tamen shuoguo:“Zhe zhishi yige fanren suo chuanshou de.” Tamen suo qingxiang di nage ren de yuyan shi hua wairen (de yuyan), er zhe (bu jingdian de yuyan) shi mingbai de alabo yu
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, zhenzhu biding bu yindao tamen, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, cai shi niezaole huangyan de, zhe deng ren que shi shuohuang de

Ji xin zhenzhu zhihou, you biaoshi buxin zhe ──chufei bei po xuancheng buxin, neixin que wei xinyang er jianding zhe ──dan wei buxin er xinqing shuchang zhe jiang zao tianqian, bing shou zhongda de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei tamen ning ai jinshi shenghuo er bu ai houshi, ye yin wei zhenzhu bu yindao bu xindao de minzhong
Tamen shi zhenzhu jiang fengbi qi xinling he shiting de ren. Zhe deng ren shi hun kui de
Wuyi de, zai houshi tamen zheng shi kui she zhe
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu beihai zhihou qianju, ranhou fendou, erqie jianren zhe, ni de zhu zai na zhihou que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.§
(Ni huiyi) zai na ri mei ge linghun dou lai wei ziji bianhu, er mei ge linghun dou de xiangshou ziji xingwei de wanquan de baochou. Tamen bu shou kui wang

Zhenzhuda yige biyu: Yige shi zhen yuan shi anquan de, anwen de, fengfu de jiyang cong ge fang yun lai, dan zhen shang de jumin gufu zhenzhu de enhui, suoyi zhenzhuyin tamen de xingwei er shi tamen changshi jidu de jihuang he kongbu
Tamen zu zhong de yige shizhe que yi lailin tamen, dan tamen fourenle ta. Zai tamen bu yi de qingkuang xia, xingfa xijile tamen
Nimen keyi chi zhenzhu shangci nimen de hefa er jiamei de shiwu, nimen yingdang ganxie zhenzhu de enhui, ruguo nimen zhi chongbai ta
Ta zhi jinzhi nimen chi zi si wu, xieye, zhurou, yiji song fei zhenzhu zhi ming er zai zhe. Dan wei shi suo po, fei chu ziyuan, qie buguo fen zhe, name, zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Nimen duiyu ziji suo xushu de shi, buyao wangyan:“Zhe shi hefa de, na shi weifa de.” Yizhi nimen jiajie zhen zhu de mingyi er zaoyao. Jiajie zhen zhu de mingyi er zaoyao zhe bi bu chenggong
(Tamen zhide) dao yidian xiangshou, er tamen jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Dui youtai jiaotu, wo ceng jin jie wo congqian suo gaosuguo ni di naxie (shiwu), wo meiyou kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji
Ranhou, ni de zhu duiyu wuzhi er zuo'e, yihou you huiguo zi xin de ren, que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Yi bo la xin yuanlai shi yige shibiao, ta fucong zhen zhu, xinfeng zhengjiao, erqie bushi yi wu pei zhu de
Ta yuan shi ganxie zhu en de, zhu tiaoxuanle ta, bing jiang ta yin shangle zhenglu
Zai jinshi, wo ceng yi xingfu shangci ta; zai houshi, ta biding juyu shanren zhi lie
Ranhou, wo qishi ni shuo:“Ni yingdang zunshou xinfeng zhengjiao de yi bo la xin de zongjiao, ta bushi yi wu pei zhu de.”
Anxiri zhishi naxie wei zhi er zhenglun de ren suo yingdang zunshou de dingzhi. Fuhuo ri, ni de zhu bi panjue tamen suo zhenglun de shifei

Ni yingdang ping zhihui heshan yan er quan ren zunxun zhu dao, ni yingdang yi zui youmei de taidu yu ren bianlun, ni de zhu dique zhidao shei shi beili ta de zhengdao de, ta dique zhidao shei shi zunxun ta de zhengdao de
Ruguo nimen yao baofu, jiu yingdang yizhao nimen suo shou de shanghai er baofu. Ruguo nimen rongren, na duiyu rongren zhe shi geng hao de
Ni yingdang rongren ──ni de rongren zhi lai zhenzhu de youzhu ──ni buyao wei tamen er beishang, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fannao
Zhenzhu que shi tong jingwei zhe he xingshan zhe zai yiqi de

Zanmei zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta zai yiye zhi jian, shi ta de puren, cong jin si xing dao yuan si. Wo zai yuan si de sizhou jiang fu, yibian wo zhaoshi ta wo de yibufen jixiang. Zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Wo ceng ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingyong zuo yiselie de zisun de xiangdao. (Wo shuo):“Nimen buyao she wo er caiqu renhe jianhu zhe!”
Wo ceng shi qi yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de zisun a! Ta yuan shi yige gan'en de puren
Wo ceng zai jingdian li qishi dui yiselie de houyi panjue (shuo):“Nimen biding yao zai da dishang liang ci zuoluan, nimen biding hen aoman.”
Dang di yici zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo paiqian wo de xuduo qiangda de puren qu chengzhi nimen, tamen jiu sousuole zhuzhai, na shi yao luxing de nuoyan
Ranhou, wo wei nimen huifule dui tamen de youshi, wo yi caifu he zisun zizhu nimen, wo shi nimen gengjia fushu

(Wo shuo):“Ruguo nimen xingshan, name, nimen shi wei ziji er xingshan; ruguo nimen zuo'e, name, nimen shi wei ziji er zuo'e.” Dang di er ci zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou,(wo you paiqian tamen), yibian tamen shi nimen bian cheng wei choumeikulian de, yibian tamen xiang tou yi ci nayang zai ru jin si, yibian tamen ba ziji suo zhanling di difang jiayi cuihui
(Ruguo nimen huigai), nimen de zhu huoxu hui lianmin nimen. Ruguo nimen chongxin weikang wo, wo jiang chongxin chengzhi nimen. Wo yi huo yu wei buxindao zhe de jianyu
Zhe bu “gulanjing” bi yindao ren yu zhi zhengzhidao, bing yugao xingshan de xinshi, tamen jiangyao xiangshou zuida de baochou
(Hai yugao) bu xin houshi zhe, wo yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa
Ren qidao huohuan, xiang qidao xingfu yiyang, ren shi jizao de

Wo yi zhouye wei liang zhong jixiang, wo mo diao heiye de jixiang, bing yi baizhou de jixiang wei mingliang de, yibian nimen xunqiu cong nimen de zhu fachu de enhui, yibian nimen zhidao lifa he suanshu. Wo mingbai di jieshi yiqie shiwu
Wo shi mei geren de xingwei fuzhuo zai ta de bozi shang. Zai fuhuo ri, wo yao wei mei geren quchu yige zhankai de benzi
(shuo:)“Ni du ni de benzi ba! Jintian, ni yi zu wei ziji de qingsuan ren.”
Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru mitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu taren de zui. Paiqian shizhe zhiqian, wo bu chengfa (renhe ren)
Dang wo yao huimie yige shi zhen de shihou, wo mingling qizhongguo anle shenghuo zhe fucong wo, dan tamen fangdang bu jian, suoyi ying shou xingfa de panjue. Yushi wo huimie tamen
Zai nu ha zhihou, wo hui mie liao ruogan shidai. Ni de zhu duiyu qi puren de zuixing, zu wei che zhi zhe he mingcha zhe

Fan yu huode xianshi shenghuo zhe, wo jiang zai xianshi yi wo suo yiyu de baoda tamen zhong wo suo yiyu zhe. Ranhou, wo jiang yi huo yu chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang shou zebei, zao qi juedi jinru huo yu
Fan yu huode houshi, bing wei houshi er jinle nuli de xindao zhe, zhe deng ren de nuli shi you baochou de
Zhe deng ren he na deng ren, wo du yao yi ni de zhu de shangci zizhu tamen, ni de zhu de shangci, bushi shou zu'ai de
Ni kan wo zenyang shi tamen zhong de yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren; houshi que shi pinji geng gao, youyue geng shen de
Ni buyao shi renhe wu yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, yimian ni bian cheng shou zebei, zao yiqi de.§

Ni de zhu ceng xialing shuo: Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai ta, yingdang xiaojing fumu. Ruguo ta lia zhong de yiren huozhe liang ren zai ni de tangshang dadao laomai, name, ni buyao dui ta lia shuo:“Pei!” Buyao he chi ta lia, ni yingdang dui ta lia shuo you limao dehua
Ni yingdang wei lianmin er bigongbijing de fushi ta lia, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni lianmin ta lia, jiu xiang wo nian you shi ta lia yangyu wo nayang.”
Nimen de zhu shi zui zhi dao nimen de xinqing de. Ruguo nimen shi shanliang de, name, ta duiyu changchang huiguo zhe que shi zhi she de
Ni yingdang ba qinqi, pinmin, luke suo ying de de zhouji fen gei tamen, ni buyao huihuo
huihuo zhe que shi emo de pengyou, emo yuan shi gufu zhu en de
Ruguo ni bixu qiu de ni suo xiwang de cong zhu jiang shi de enhui hou caineng zhouji tamen, name, ni yinggai dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua
Ni buyao ba ni de shou shu zai ziji de bozi shang, ye buyao bashou wanquan shen kai, yimian ni bian cheng huihen de shou zebei zhe
Ni de zhu bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang fuyu, bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang jiongpo. Ni de zhu duiyu ta de zhong pu, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Nimen buyao yinwei pa pinqiong er shahai ziji de ernu, wo gongji tamen he nimen. Shahai tamen que shi dazui
Nimen buyao jiejin si tong, yinwei si tong que shi xialiu de shi, zhe xingjing zhen elie
Nimen buyao weibei zhenzhu de jinling er sharen, chufei yinwei zhengyi. Wugu'er bei sha zhe, wo yi ba quanbing shouyu ta de qinqi, dan ta buke lan sha, ta que shi shou yuanzhu de
Nimen buyao jiejin gu er de caichan, chufei yizhao zui youliang de fangshi, zhidao ta chengnian. Nimen yingdang luxing nuoyan; nuoyan que shi yao bei shenwen de shi
Dang nimen mai liang de shihou, yingdang liang zu fenliang, nimen yingdang shiyong gongping de cheng cheng huowu, zhe shi shanshi, shi jieju zui you de
Ni buyao suicong ni suo bu zhidao de yanxing, ermu he xinling dou shi yao bei shenwen de
Ni buyao jiao'ao ziman di zai dadishang xingzou, ni jue buneng ba dadi ta chuan, jue buneng yu shan shi bi gao
Zhexie shi, qi elie shi ni de zhu suo yanwu de
Zhe shi ni de zhu suo qishi ni de zhihui, ni buyao shi renhe shenming yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, fouze, ni jiang zai shou zebei he zao qi jue de qingkuang xia bei touru huo yu
Nandao nimen de zhu ba nan'er shangci nimen, er yi zhong tianshen wei ziji de nu'er ma? Nimen dique shuo chu huangmiu dehua
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo que yi fanfu shenshu zhege zongzhi, yibian tamen mingji. Zhe zhong shenshu zhi hui shi tamen gengjia zengwu
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo you xuduo shenming he ta zai yiqi, youru tamen suo shuo di nayang, name, naxie shenling biding xiangfangshefa yu baozuo de zhu zheng heng.”
Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta jue ran chao hu tamen suo shuo de
Qi ceng tian he da di, yiji wan you dou zansong ta chaojue wanwu, wu yi wu bu zansong ta chaojue wanwu, dan nimen bu liaojie tamen de zansong. Ta que shi rongren de, que shi zhi she de
Dang nimen songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, wo zai ni he buxin houshi zhe zhi jian anzhi yi du yin wei de pingzhang

Wo zai tamen de xin shang jiale xuduo zhaozi, yimian tamen liaojie “gulanjing”; you zai tamen de er li zaole zhong ting, dang ni zai “gulanjing” li zhi ti dao ni de zhu de shihou, tamen zengwu de li qu
Wo zui zhidao tamen weihe yao qingting ni song jing, dangshi tamen lai qingting ni song jing, bingqie mimi de tanhua. Dangshi bu yi zhemen shuo:“Nimen zhishi shuncong yige zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ni kan tamen zenyang wei ni dale xuduo biyu, dan tamen suo shuo de dou bu zhongken, tamen buneng huode yitiao chulu
Tamen shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women huan yiding hui bei fuhuo chengwei xinren ma?”§
Ni shuo:“Jinguan nimen bian cheng shi tou, huo tie kuai

huo nimen renwei geng nanyu jieshou shengming de shenme dongxi ba.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shei shi women fuhuo ne?” Ni shuo:“Chuci chuangzao nimen de zhu.” Tamen jiang dui ni yaotou shuo:“Zhe jian shi jiang zai he shi fasheng ne?” Ni shuo:“Zhe jian shi huoxu shi linjinle.”
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan nimen, er nimen jiang yi rongci daying ta. Nimen jiang caixiang ziji zai fenmu li zhi douliule yihui'er
Ni gaosu wo de pu renmen: Jiao tamen shuo zhe ju zui youmei dehua ──emo biding yao lijian tamen, emo que shi renlei de ming di ──
“nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de, ta yao lianmin nimen jiu lianmin nimen; ta yao chengfa nimen jiu chengfa nimen.” Wo mei paiqian ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe
Ni de zhu shi zhidao tiandi wanwu de. Wo que yi shi yibufen xianzhi chaoyue ling yibufen; wo ceng yi jingdian shangci da wu de
Ni shuo:“Nimen she zhenzhu er cheng wei shenming zhe, nimen qidao tamen ba! Tamen buneng ti nimen xiao zai, ye buneng ti nimen jia huo.”

Tamen suo cheng wei shenming zhe, zishen qiu jin zhu zhi jie. Bi tamen geng jin yu zhu zhe ye qiu jin zhu zhi jie, tamen xiwang zhu de enhui, weiju zhu de xingfa. Ni de zhu de xingfa shi yinggai fangbei de
Yiqie shi zhen, zai fuhuo ri zhiqian, wo du yao jiayi huimie, huo jiayi yanli de chengfa, zhe shi jilu zai tian jing li de
Wo bu jiang shi jixiang, zhi wei qian ren bu chengren ta. Wo ceng yi mu tuo gei sai mo de ren zuo mingzheng, dan tamen bu chengren ta. Wo jiang jixiang zhishi weile dong xia

Dangshi wo ceng dui ni shuo:“Ni de zhu shi quanzhi zhongren de. Wo suo zhaoshi ni de meng zhao he zai “gulanjing” li suo zuzhou di na ke shu, wo zhi yi zhe liang jian shiwu kaoyan zhongren, bing jiayi donghe, dan wo de donghe zhi shi tamen gengjia manheng.”
Dangshi wo ceng dui zhong tianshen shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen jiu xiang ta koutou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta shuo:“Ni yong nitu zaocheng de, wo zen neng xiang ta koutou ne?”
Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, zhe jiushi ni shi ta chaoyue wo de ren ma? Ruguo ni kuanxian wo dao fuhuo ri, wo shi bi genjue ta de houyi, dan shaoshu ren chuwai.”
Zhenzhu shuo:“Ni qu ba! Tamen zhong fan shuncong ni de, huo yu biding shi tamen he ni de chongzu de baochou

Ni keyi yong ni de shengyin qu donghe tamen zhong ni suo neng donghe de ren; ni keyi tongshuai ni de qibing he bubing, qu fandui tamen; ni keyi he tamen tong xiang tamen de caichan he ernu; ni keyi xu gei tamen (renhe dongxi)──emo zhi xu gei tamen wangxiang ──
wo de puren, ni dui tamen jue wu quanbing, ni de zhu zu wei jianhu zhe.”
Nimen de zhu wei nimen er shi chuanzhi zai haishang hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui. Ta dui nimen que shi zhi ci de

Dang nimen zai haishang zaoshou zaihai de shihou, nimen xianglai suo qidao de yi huibi nimenle, er nimen zhiyou qidao zhule. Dangzhu shi nimen ping'an denglu de shihou, nimen beipanle zhu. Ren yuan shi gu en de
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen lunxian dixia, huo shi feishazoushi de kuangfeng saodang nimen, er nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe jianhu zhe ma
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen zai qu hanghai, er shi baofeng xiji nimen, bing wei nimen de gu en er shi nimen chenni, ranhou, nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe dui wo baochou zhe ma?§
Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, wo shi tamen zai lu shang huo haishang du you suo qi cheng, wo yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen, wo shi tamen dada di chaoguo wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren
(Ni ji zhu,) zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji qi shibiao. Yi youshou jieshou qi gongguo bu zhe, jiang yuedu ziji de benzi; tamen bu shou yi sihao kui she
Zai jinshi shi mangren zhe, zai houshi reng shi mangren, erqie gengjia mi wu
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu weibei wo suo qishi de jiaoxun, yibian ni jiajie wo de mingyi, er niezao qita de jiaoxun. Name tamen jiu hui ba ni dangzuo pengyou
Yao bushi wo shi ni jianding, ni jihu que yi youdian er qingxiang yu tamenle
Ruguo nayang, wo bi shi ni zai shengqian changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai si hou changshi jiabei de xingfa, shi ni buneng zhaodao renhe ren bangzhu ni lai duikang wo
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu buneng anju guxiang, yibian tamen ba ni zhu chu jingwai. Ruguo nayang, tamen zai ni bei zhu zhihou, zhide douliu yihui'er
Zhe shi zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de zhong shizhe de changdao, ni duiyu wo de changdao buneng faxian renhe biangeng
Ni yingdang jin shou cong chen shi dao heiye de bai gong; bing yingdang jin shou zaochen de bai gong, zaochen de bai gong que shi bei canjia de
Zai yeli de yiduan shijian, ni yingdang jin shou ni suo dang shou de fujia de bai gong, ni de zhu huoxu ba ni ti dao yige zhide chengsong di diwei
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli er ru, qiu ni shi wo shunli er chu, qiu ni shangci wo cong ni nali fachu de quanbing, yi zuo wo de fubi.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli yi lailinliao, xuwang yi xiaomiele; xuwang que shi yi mie de.”
Wo jiang shi keyi wei xinshimen zhiliao he gei tamen yi enhui de “gulanjing”, ta zhi hui shi bu yi zhe gengjia kui she
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta diaotou bugu; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta bian cheng juewang de
Ni shuo:“Ge ren yi ziji de fangfa er gongzuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shei shi geng jin yu zhengdao de.”
Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:“Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.” Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de (“gulanjing”) xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe
Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui er (baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui que shi zhongda de
Ni shuo:“Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, name, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.”
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu ge zhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin
Tamen shuo:“Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yong chu
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he pu tao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang; huozhe ni qing zhenzhu he zhong tianshen lai (yu women) jianmian

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women yi ben women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.” Ni shuo:“Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.”
Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:“Nandao zhenzhu paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo dadishang you xuduo tianshen anran buxing, name wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshen qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de purenmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.”

Zhenzhu yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian zhenzhu yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?”§
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Chuangzaole tiandi wanwu de zhenzhu neng chuangzao xiang tamen nayang de ren, bing neng wei tamen queding yige hao wu keyi de qixian, bu yi de renmen zhi yuan buxin
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo wo de zhu de enhui de kucang gui nimen guanli, name, nimen biding yinwei pa kaizhi er kouliu ta de enhui. Ren shi linse de.”

Dang mu sa lailin yiselie ren de shihou, wo que yi shangci mu sa jiu zhong mingxian de jixiang. Ni wen yi wen yiselie ren ba, falao dui ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ta shuo:“Ni queshi zhidao, zhiyou tiandi de zhu neng jiang shi zhexie zuowei mingzheng. Falao a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi yao huimie de.”
Ta yao ba tamen zhu chu jingwai, dan wo shi ta he ta de jundui tongtong yan si
Zai ta miewang zhihou, wo dui yiselie ren shuo:“Nimen juzhu zhege difang ba! Dang houshi de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo yao ba nimen zada de zhaoji lai.”
Wo zhi ben zhenli er jiang shi “gulanjing”, er “gulanjing” ye zhi han zhenli er jiangxia. Wo zhi paiqian ni zuo baoxi xinzhe he jinggao zhe
Zhe shi yi bu “gulanjing”, wo shi ta yiyi mingbai, yibian ni congrongbupo di dui zhongren xuandu ta; wo zhujian de jiang shi ta
Ni shuo:“Nimen keyi xinyang ta, ye keyi buxinyang ta.” Zai jiang shi ta zhiqian yi huode zhishi de renmen, dang ting dao renmen songdu ta de shihou, tamen fufu koutou
Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women de zhu de nuoyan biding yao bei luxing.”
Tamen tongkuzhe fufu xiaqu,“gulanjing” shi tamen gengjia gongjing.※

(Ni shuo:)“Nimen keyi cheng ta wei zhenzhu, ye keyi cheng ta wei zhiren zhu. Yinwei ta you xuduo ji youmei de ming hao, nimen wulun yong shenme ming hao chenghu ta,(dou shi hen hao de).” Ni zai bai zhong buyao gao sheng langsong, ye buyao di sheng modu, ni yingdang xunqiu yitiao shizhong de daolu
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta meiyou shouyang ernu, meiyou tong ta gongxiang guo quan de, meiyou wei mian beijian er she de fuzhu zhe. Ni yingdang zansong ta de zunda.”
Yiqie zansong, quan guizhen zhu! Ta yi duanzheng de jingdian jiang shi ta de pu ren, er wei zai qizhong zhizao renhe pian xie
yibian ta jinggao shiren, zhen zhuyao jiangxia yanli de chengfa; er xiang xingshan de xinshimen baoxi, gaosu tamen jiang shou youmei de baochou
er yong ju qizhong
qie jinggao wangyan “zhen zhu shouyang ernu” de ren
Tamen he tamen de zuxian, duiyu zhe ju hua dou hao wu zhi shi, tamen xinkoukaihe de shuo zhe ju huangmiu juelun dehua
Ruguo tamen bu xin zhe xun ci, zai tamen beili zhihou, ni huoxu wei beishang er zisha
Wo que yi shi dadishang de yiqie shiwu chengwei da di de zhuangshi pin, yibian wo kaoyan shiren, kan shei de gongzuo shi zui youmei de
Wo bi huimie da dishang de yiqie shiwu, er shi da di bian wei huangliang de
Nandao ni yiwei yandong he beiwen de zhuren shi wo de jixiang zhong de yi jian qi shi ma
Dangshi, you ji ge qingnian bi ju shandong zhong, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba ni nali de enhui shangci women, qiu ni shi women de shiye wanquan duanzheng.”
Wo jiu shi tamen zai shandong li ji nian buneng tingwen
Houlai wo shi tamen suxing, yibian wo zhidao liang pai zhong de na yipai geng neng jisuan tamen suo tingliu de shiqi
Wo ba tamen de gushi, chengshi di gaosu ni, tamen shi ji ge qingnian, tamen xinyang tamen de zhu, er wo gei tamen zengjia zhengdao
Wo ceng shi tamen de xin jianren. Dangshi, tamen zhan qilai shuo:“Women de zhu, shi tiandi de zhu, women jue bu she ta er qidao renhe shenming, fouze, women biding shuo chu bu jin qingli dehua

Women de zhexie tongzu, she ta er chongbai bie de xuduo shenming, tamen zenme buyong yige mingzheng lai zhengshi naxie shenming shi ying shou chongbai de ne? Jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao de ren, you shei bi ta hai bu yi ne?”
Dang nimen liqi tamen he tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai (ouxiang) de shihou, ke bi ju shandong, nimen de zhujiang dui nimen guang shi enhui, bing shi nimen de shiye wei youli de.§

Ni kan taiyang chulai de shihou, cong tamen de shandong de youbian xieshe guoqu; taiyang luoshan de shihou, cong tamen de zuobian xieshe guoqu, tongshi tamen jiu zai shandong de kong chu. Zhe shi zhenzhu de yi zhong jixiang, zhenzhu yindao shei, shei zunxun zhengdao; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni jue buneng wei shei faxian renhe pengyou zuowei yindao zhe

Ni yiwei tamen shijuexing de, qishi tamen shi hanshui de, wo shi tamen zuoyou fanzhuan, tamen de gou shen zhao liang tiao tui wo zai dongkou. Ruguo ni kanjian tamen, ni bi xia de zhuan lian er tao, manhuai kongbu

Wo ruci shi tamen juexing, yibian tamen huxiang xunwen, qizhong youyigeren shuo:“Nimen douliule duojiu?” Tamen shuo:“Women douliule yitian, huo bu dao yitian.” Tamen shuo:“Nimen de zhu zui qingchu nimen douliu de shijian de. Nimen pai nimen zhong de yige ren, daizhe nimen de zhexie yinbi dao cheng li qu, kan kan shei jia de shipin zui qingjie, jiao ta maidian shipin lai gei nimen, yao jiao ta hen jinshen, buyao shi renhe ren zhidao nimen
Cheng li de ren, ruguo nazhe nimen, jiang yong shitou da si nimen, huozhe qiangpo nimen xinfeng tamen de zongjiao, name, nimen jiu yong bu hui chenggongle.”

Wo zheyang shi bieren kuijian tamen, yibian tamen zhidao zhenzhu de nuoyan shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shike shi hao wu keyi de. Dangshi, tamen wei ci shi er zhenglun, tamen shuo:“Nimen zai tamen de sizhou xiuyi du weiqiang ──tamen de zhu shi zui liaojie tamen de.” Zhuchi shiwu de ren shuo:“Women biding zai tamen de sizhou jianzhu yi suo libaisi.”

Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi san ge, di si ge shi tamen de gou.” Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi wu ge, di liu ge shi tamen de gou.” Zhe shi youyu caice youxuan. Hai youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi qi ge, di ba ge shi tamen de gou.” Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao tamen de shumu di, ciwai, zhiyou shaoshu ren zhidao tamen. Ni duiyu tamen de shiqing, zhi ke zuo biaomian de bianlun, ni duiyu tamen de shiqing, buyao qingjiao renhe ren.”
Ni buyao wei mou shiqing er shuo:“Mingtian wo yiding zuo na jian shi.”
Chufei tongshi shuo:“Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu.” Ni ruguo wangle, jiu yingdang ji qi ni de zhu, bingqie shuo:“Wo de zhu huoxu zhishi wo bi zhe geng qiejin de zhengdao.”
Tamen zai shandong li douliule sanbai nian,(an yinli suan) tamen you jia jiu nian

Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu shi zui zhidao tamen douliu de shijian de. Wei you ta zhidao tiandi de youxuan. Ta de shi jue zhen ming! Ta de tingjue zhen cong! Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen jue wu yuanzhu zhe, zhenzhu bu rang renhe ren shen yu ta de panjue.”
Ni yingdang xuandu ni de zhu suo qishi ni de jingdian, ta de yanci, jue bushi renhe ren suo neng biangeng de.(She zhenzhu wai) ni jue buneng faxian yi ge yinbi suo

Zai zaochen he wan xi qidao ziji de zhu er qiu qi xiyue zhe, ni yingdang naixin di he tamen zai yiqi, buyao miaoshi tamen, er qiu jinshi shenghuo de fuhua. Wo shi mou xie ren de xin hushi wo de jiaoxun, er shuncong ziji de yuwang. Tamen de xingwei shi guofen de, zhe zhong ren nimen buyao shuncong tamen

Ni shuo:“Zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shei yuan xindao jiu rang ta xin ba, shei bu yuan xindao, jiu rang ta buxin ba.” Wo yi wei bu yi de ren, yubeile liehuo, na liehuo de yanmu jiang longzhao tamen. Ruguo tamen (wei gan ke er) qiujiu, jiu yi yi zhong shui gong tamen jieke, na zhong shui xiang liqing nayang shaozhuo ren mian, na yinliao zhen zaogao! Na guisu zhen elie
Xindao er xingshan zhe, wo bi bu shi tamen de shanxing tulao wu chou

zhe deng ren de xiangshou changzhu de leyuan, tamen xia lin zhu he, tamen zai leyuan li, pei jin zhi de shouzhuo, chuan ling luo jinduan de lu pao, kao zai chuangshang. Na baochou, zhen youmei! Na guisu, zhen meihao!§

wo jiang jicheng tasuo shuo de caichan he zisi. Er ta jiang danshen lai jian wo

Wo wei ziji er tiaoxuan ni

Wo shuo:“Ni buyao pa, ni que shi zhan youshi de

Tamen shuo:“Ta zenme bu cong ta de zhu nali na yi zhong jixiang lai gei women ne?” Guanyu “gulanjing” de chanming, nandao meiyou jianglin tamen ma

Tamen shi manbujingxin, bu yi zhe mimi tanlun shuo:“Zhe zhishi yige xiang nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu er shuncong ta ma?”

Zai tamen zhiqian, wo suo huimie de chengshi, meiyou yige ceng xin jixiang de. Xianzai, tamen hui xin jixiang ma
Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle ceng feng qishi de xuduo nanren; ruguo nimen bu zhidao, jiu yingdang xunwen jingtong jinian zhe
Wo meiyou ba tamen zaocheng bu chifan de roushen, tamen ye bushi changsheng bulao de
Sihou, wo dui tamen shijian nuo yue, gu zhengjiu tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, er huimiele guofen zhe
Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi ben jingdian, qizhong you nimen de jiaohui, nandao nimen bu liaojie ma
Wo ceng huimiele xuduo bu yi de xiangcun, suihou, wo ceng chuangzaole bie de minzhong
Dang tamen ganjue wo de yanxing de shihou, tamen huran bentao
“Nimen buyao bentao, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de haohua shenghuo, he nimen de zhuzhai, yibian nimen jianglai shou shenxun.”
Tamen shuo:“Ai zai women! Women yuanlai que shi bu yi de ren.”
Na ju hua, jiangyao chang wei tamen de aihao, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng gu cha he sihui
Wo weiceng yi youxi de taidu chuangzao tiandi wanwu
jiaruo wo yao xiaoqian, wo biding yi wo zheli de dongxi zuo xiaoqian, wo bushi ai xiaoqian de
Wo yi zhenli touzhi miu wang, er jipo qi naodai, miu wang shunshi xiaowang. Bei zai nimen! Youyu nimen (dui zhenzhu) wang jia miaoshu
Fan zai tiandi jian de dou shi ta de; fan zai ta nali de, dou qiancheng de chongbai ta, ji bu aoman, you bu pijuan
Tamen zhouye zan ta chaojue, hao bu songxie
Nandao tamen ba da dishang xuduo dongxi dang shenming, er naxie shenming neng shi siren fuhuo ma
chu zhenzhu wai, jiaruo tiandi jian hai you xuduo shenming, name, tiandi biding pohuaile. Zansong zhenzhu ──baozuo de zhu ──shi chao hu tamen de miaoshu de

Ruguo nimen faxian bieren jiali meiyou renhe ren, nimen jiu buyao jinqu, zhidao nimen huode xuke. Ruguo youren dui nimen shuo:“Qing zhuan huiqu!” Nimen jiu yingdang liji zhuan huiqu, zhe duiyu nimen shi geng chunjie de. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi nimen de xingwei de
Ruguo fangwu nei meiyou sijia juzhu, er qizhong you nimen ziji de caiwu, nimen wufang zou jinqu. Zhenzhu zhidao nimen suo biaoxian de he nimen suo yincang de
Ni dui xinshimen shuo, jiao tamen jiangdi shixian, zhebi xiashen, zhe duiyu tamen shi geng chunjie de. Zhenzhu que shi che zhi tamen de xingwei de

Ni dui xin numen shuo, jiao tamen jiangdi shixian, zhebi xiashen, mo luchu shoushi, chufei ziran luchu de, jiao tamen yong miansha zhe zhu xiongtang, mo luchu shoushi, chufei dui tamen de zhangfu, huo tamen de fuqin, huo tamen de zhangfu de fuqin, huo tamen de erzi, huo tamen de zhangfu de erzi, huo tamen de dixiong, huo tamen dixiong de erzi, huo tamen jiemei de erzi, huo tamen de nupu, huo tamen de nubi, huo wu xingyu de nan pu, huo bu dong funu zhi shi de ertong; jiao tamen buyao yongli tazu, shi ren de zhi tamen suo yincang de shoushi. Xinshimen a! Nimen ying quanti xiang zhenzhu huizui, yibian nimen chenggong

Nimen zhong weihun de nannu he nimen de shanliang de nubi, nimen yingdang shi tamen huxiang peihe. Ruguo tamen shi pinqiong de, name, zhenzhuyao yi ta de enhui, shi tamen fuzu. Zhenzhu shi fuyu de, shi quanzhi de

Buneng qu qi zhe, jiao tamen jili baochi zhencao, zhidao zhenzhu yi ta de enhui er shi tamen fuzu. Nimen de nubi zhong yaoqiu ding yue shushen zhe, ruguo nimen zhidao tamen shi zhongshi de, nimen jiu yingdang yu tamen ding yue, bingqie ba zhen zhu ciyu nimen de caichan fen yibufen gei tamen. Ruguo nimen de binu yao baoshou zhencao, nimen jiu buyao weile huode jinshi shenghuo de fu li er qiangpo tamen maiyin. Ruguo youren qiangpo tamen, name, zai bei po zhihou, zhen zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Wo que yi ba xuduo mingbai de jixiang he zai nimen zhiqian shiqu zhe de xianli, yiji duiyu jingwei zhe de jiaoxun, jiang shi nimen.§

Zhenzhu shi tiandi de guangming, ta de guangming xiang yizuo dengtai, na zuo dengtai shang youyi zhan mingdeng, na zhan mingdeng zai yige boli zhao li, nage boli zhao fangfu yi ke canlan de mingxing, yong jixiang de ganlan you ranzhe na zhan mingdeng; ta bushi dongfang de, ye bushi xifang de, ta de you, jishi meiyou dianhuo ye jihu faguang ──guang shang jia guang ──zhenzhu yindao tasuo yiyu zhe zouxiang ta de guangming. Zhenzhu wei zhongren shele xuduo biyu, zhenzhu shi quanzhi wanshi de
Youxie siyuan, zhenzhu yunxu jianli zhi, bing yunxu zai qizhong songyang ta de zhenming. Zai nali zhaoxi zansong zhenzhu chaojue wanwu de
shi ruogan nanzi. Shangye buneng shi tamen shuhu er bu jinian zhenzhu, jin shou bai gong he wan na tian ke, tamen weiju na xin luan yanhua de rizi
Yibian zhenzhu yi tamen de xing wei de shan bao shangci tamen, bing yi ta de enhui jia ci tamen. Zhenzhu wu liang di gongji tasuo yiyu zhe

Bu xindao zhe de shangong qiaru shamo li de shen jing, kou ke zhe yiwei na li you shui, dengdao ta lai dao you shen jing di difang shi, meiyou faxian shenme, que faxian zhenzhu zai nali. Zhenzhu jiu ba ta de zhang mu wanquan jiao gei ta, zhenzhu shi qingsuan shensu de

Huo ru chongchong hei'an, longzhaozhe wangyang dahai, botao pengpai, shang you hei yun, hei'an chongchong die die, guan zhe shen chushou lai shi, jihu bujian wuzhi. Zhenzhu meiyou gei shei guangming, shei jiu jue wu guangming
Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Fanshi zai tiandi jian de renwu he zhanchi de qun niao, dou zansong zhenzhu shi chaojue de. Ta dique zhidao ge wu de qidao he zansong, zhenzhu shi quanzhi tamen de xingwei de
Tiandi de zhuquan, zhishi zhenzhu de, zhenzhu shi weiyi de guisu

Nandao ni bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu shi yun huan huan de yidong, er jiayi peihe, ranhou ba ta duiji qilai. Ni jiu kanjian yu cong yun jian jiangxia. Ta cong tiankong zhong, cong shanyue ban de yun nei, jiangxia bingbao, yong lai zhemo tasuo yiyu zhe, er mianchu tasuo yiyu zhe. Dianguang shanshan, jihu duoqu muguang
Zhenzhu shi zhouye gengdie, duiyu you shili zhe, ci zhong que youyi zhong jianjie
Zhenzhu yongshui chuangzao yiqie dongwu, qizhong youyong fubu xingzou de, youyong liang zu xingzou de, youyong si zu xingzou de. Zhenzhu chuangzao tasuo yiyu zhe, zhenzhu duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Wo que yi jiang shi xuduo mingbai de jixiang, zhenzhu zhidao tasuo yiyu zhe zouxiang zhenglu
Tamen shuo:“Women yi xinyang zhenzhu he shizhe, women yi shuncongle.” Cihou, tamen zhong youyi huo ren weibei zhengdao; zhe deng ren, jue bushi xinshi
Dang tamen bei zhao guiyu zhenzhu ji qi shizhe, yibian ta wei tamen er panjue de shihou, tamen zhong de yi huo ren, huran guibi
Ruguo tamen youli, tamen jiu tie fude mang lai jian ta
Tamen xinzhong you bing ne? Haishi tamen huaiyi ne? Haishi tamen kongpa zhenzhu ji qi shizhe dui tamen bugong ne? Buran! Zhe deng ren zheng shi bu yi de
Dang xinshi bei zhao guiyu zhenzhu ji qi shizhe yibian ta ti tamen panjue de shihou, tamen zhi yingdang shuo:“Women yi tingcongle.” Zhe deng ren que shi chenggong de
Fan shuncong zhenzhu he shizhe erqie jingwei zhenzhu zhe, que shi chenggong de.§

Tamen zhi zhenzhu er fachu zui recheng de shiyan shuo, ruguo ni ming tamen chuzheng, tamen biding chuzheng. Ni shuo:“Nimen buyao fashi. Heli de fucong shi geng hao de. Zhenzhu que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de.”

Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang fucong zhenzhu, yingdang fucong shizhe. Ruguo nimen weibei mingling, name, ta zhi fu ta de zeren, nimen zhi fu nimen de zeren. Ruguo nimen fucong ta, nimen jiu zunxun zhengdao. Shizhe zhi fu mingbai de chuanda de zeren.”

Zhenzhu yingxu nimen zhong xindao erqie xingshan zhe (shuo): Ta bi shi tamen dai ta zhili dadi, zhengru ta shi zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe dai ta zhili dadi yiyang; ta bi wei tamen er gonggu tasuo wei tamen jia na de zongjiao; ta bi yi anning daiti tamen de kongbu. Tamen chongbai wo er bu yi renhe wu pei wo. Cihou, fan bu xindao de, dou shi zuiren
Nimen yingdang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, fucong shizhe, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin
Bu xindao zhe, ni jue buyao yiwei tamen zai da dishang shi neng taobi tianqian de, tamen de guisu shi huo yu, na guisu zhen elie

Xinshimen a! Jiao nimen de nubi he nimen zhong shangwei cheng ding de ertong, sanci xiang nimen qingshi, chen li zhiqian, zhengwu tuoyi zhi shi, xiao li zhihou, zhe shi nimen de san ge bu fangbei de shihou. Chu ci er wai, nimen he tamen wufang suibian wanglai. Zhenzhu zheyang wei nimen chanming yixie jixiang. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de

Dang nimen de hai zi cheng ding de shihou, jiao tamen xiang zai tamen zhiqian cheng ding zhe yiyang, suishi xiang nimen qingqiu jiejian. Zhenzhu zheyang wei nimen chanming ta de jixiang. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Bu xiwang jiehun de lao fu, tuo qu waiyi, er bu luchu shoushi, zhe duiyu tamen shi wu zuiguo de. Ziji jiandian, dui tamen shi geng hao de. Zhenzhu shi quan cong de, shi quanzhi de

Yu ren tongxi, duiyu mangren shi wu zuiguo de, duiyu quezi shi wu zuiguo de, duiyu bingren yeshi wu zuiguo de. Wulun zai nimen ziji de jiali, huo zai nimen fuqin de jiali, huo zai nimen muqin de jiali, huo zai nimen dixiong de jiali, huo zai nimen jiemei de jiali, huo zai nimen shubai de jiali, huo zai nimen gumu de jiali, huo zai nimen jiufu de jiali, huo zai nimen yimu de jiali, huo zai you nimen guanli yaoshi zhe de jiali, huo zai nimen pengyou de jiali, nimen yinshi, duiyu nimen shi wu zui de. Nimen jucan huo fen shi, duiyu nimen dou shi wu zui de. Nimen jin jia de shihou, nimen dang dui ziji zhu an ──zhenzhu suo zhiding de, jixiang er youmei de zhuci. Zhenzhu zheyang wei nimen chanming yi qie jixiang, yibian nimen liaojie

Xinshi zhishi xinyang zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de ren; dang tamen wei renhe yao shi er yu shizhe jihui de shihou, tamen bu tuixi, zhidao tamen xiang ta qingqiu yunxu. Xiang ni qingshi zhe, que shi xinyang zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de. Dang tamen yin sishi er xiang ni qingshi de shihou, ni keyi yunxu ni suo yiyu zhe, ni dang wei tamen xiang zhenzhu qiurao. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de

Nimen buyao ba shizhe duiyu nimen de zhaohuan dang zuo nimen xianghu jian de zhaohuan. Zhenzhu que shi renshi nimen zhong liu zou zhe. Weikang ta de mingling zhe, jiao tamen jinfang huohuan jianglin tamen, huo tongku de xingfa jianglin tamen
Zhen de, tiandi wanwu, que shi zhenzhu de. Ta que yi zhidao nimen de shiqing. Dang tamen bei zhao dao zhu nali zhi ri, ta yao ba tamen de xingwei gaosu tamen. Zhenzhu shi quanzhi wanshi de.§
Shengjie zai zhenzhu! Ta jiang shi zhunze gei ta de puren, yibian ta zuo quan shijie de jinggao zhe
Tiandi de guotu shi ta de; ta meiyou shouyang erzi, zai guotu zhong meiyou huoban. Ta chuangzao wanwu, bing jiayi jingmi de zhuding

Tamen chu zhenzhu wai er chongbai xuduo shenling, naxie shenling buneng chuangzao renhe wu, tamen ziji que shi bei zao de; tamen buneng zhuchi zishen de huo fu, ye buneng zhuchi (taren de) shengsi he fuhuo
Bu xindao zhe shuo:“Zhe zhishi tasuo niezao de yaoyan, bie de xuduo ren ceng bangzhu ta.” Tamen yi zuo liao bu yi de shi, yi shuole miu wang dehua
Tamen shuo:“Zhe shi guren de shenhua, ta shi ren chaolu xialai, zhaoxi dui ta songdu.”
Ni shuo:“Zhidao tiandi de aomi zhe jiang shile ta. Ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.”
Tamen shuo:“Zhege shizhe zenme ye chifan, ye wanglai yu shichang zhi jian ne? Weihe zhenzhu bu pai yige tianshen jianglin ta, er yu ta tong wei jinggao zhe
huozhe ba yige caibao shangci ta, huozhe ta you yizuo guoyuan, gong ta shiyong ne?” Bu yi zhe shuo:“Nimen zhi shuncong yige bei guhuo zhe.”
Ni kan tamen zenyang wei ni dale xuduo piyu, er tamen ziji wu ru qitu, gu buneng huode yitiao zhenglu
Shengjie zai zhenzhu! Ruguo ta yiyu, ta yao shangci ni bi nage geng hao de, ji xia lin zhu he de yixie guoyuan, ta yao shangci ni yixie dasha
Buran, tamen fouren fuhuo ri, wo yi wei fouren fuhuo ri zhe yubei liehuo
Dang ta cong yuan chu kanjian tamen de shihou, tamen tingjian baolie sheng he taixi sheng
Dang tamen bei jiasuozhe touru liehuo zhong yige xia'ai difang de shihou, tamen zai nali aihao qiu si
Jintian nimen buyao aiqiu yisi, nimen dang aiqiu duo si
Ni shuo:“Zhe shi geng hao de ne? Haishi yingxu jingwei zhe yong ju qizhong de leyuan geng hao ne? Ta shi tamen suoyou de baochou he guisu
tamen zai leyuan zhong de xiangshou ziji suo yiyu de (xingfu). Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, zhe shi keyi xiang ni de zhu yaoqiu shijian de nuoyan
Zai na ri, ta yao ba tamen he tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai de (ouxiang) jihe qilai, ranhou shuo:“Jiujing shi nimen shi wo de zhexie puren mi wu ne? Haishi tamen ziji panli zhenglu ne?”

Tamen shuo:“Women zansong ni chaojue wanwu, women bu gai she ni er jing shi renhe shenling. Dan ni ceng shi tamen ji qi zuxian xiangle, zhidao tamen yiwangle jinian, tamen yuan shi miewang de minzhong.”
(Zhu shuo):“Tamen que yi fouren nimen suo shuo dehua, nimen buneng taobi xingfa, ye buneng zizhu. Nimen zhong shei shi bu yi de, wo yao shi shei changshi yanjun de xingfa

Wo zai ni zhiqian suo paiqian de shizhe, meiyou yige shi bu chifan de, meiyou yige shi bu laiwang yu shichang zhi jian de. Wo shi nimen huxiang kaoyan, kan kan nimen neng rennai ma? Ni de zhu shi mingcha de.”
Bu xiwang yu wo xiang hui zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu shi zhong tianshen jianglin women, huozhe women de jian women de zhu ne?” Tamen que yi wangzizunda, que yi danibudao
Tamen kanjian zhong tianshen de rizi, fanzui zhe jiang meiyou hao xiaoxi, zhong tianshen yao dui tamen shuo:“(Leyuan duiyu nimen) shi ying wei yanjin de.”
Wo jiang chuli tamen suo xing de shangong, er shi ta bian cheng feiyang de huichen
Zai na ri, leyuan de jumin jiang zai yige zui you de juzhu zhi di, yige zuimei de xiuxi zhi suo
Zai na ri, zhu tian jiang yu baiyun yidao polie, zhong tianshen jiang fengming zhuangyan de jianglin
Zai na ri, zhenshi de guotu shi shuyu zhiren zhu de. Na ri, dui bu xindao zhe shi yige yanku de rizi
Zai na ri, bu yi zhe yimian yao shou yimian shuo:“A! Dan yuan wo ceng yu shizhe caiqu tongyi daolu
A! Ai zai! Dan yuan wo meiyou yi mou renwei pengyou
Jinian ji jianglin zhihou, ta que yi shi wo weibei ta.” Emo xianglai shi yiqi ren de
Shizhe ceng shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu yi zhe “gulanjing” wei qi wu.”
Wo zheyang shi mei ge xianzhi, dou you yixie zuiren zuo ta de choudi, ni de zhu zu wei yindao zhe he yuanzhu zhe
Bu xindao zhe ceng shuo:“Zenme bu ba quanbu “gulanjing” yici jiang shi ta ne?” Wo nayang (ling ling xingxing di jiang shi ta) yibian wo ping ta lai jianding ni de xin, wo zhujian jiang shi ta
Tamen mei xiang ni tichu yi zhong feinan, wo jiu qishi ni zhenli he geng meiman de jieshi
Naxie bei pufuzhe jihe yu huo yu zhong zhe shi diwei geng elie, shi pianli zhenglu geng yuan de
Wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingqie renming ta di gege ha lun zuo ta de zhushou
Wo shuo:“Ni lia qu jiaohua naxie fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong.” Wo zhongyu huimiele tamen
Nu ha de zongzu fouren shizhe de shihou, wo yan sile tamen, bingqie yi tamen wei shiren de jianjie. Wo yiwei bu yi zhe zhunbeile tongku de xingfa
A de ren, sai mo de ren, lan si de jumin yiji zai tamen zhi jian de ruogan shidai
wo yi wei mei yige shidai de ren chanmingguo xuduo piyu, wo huimiele mei yi shidai de ren
Tamen que yi jingli na zao e yu de chengshi, nandao tamen meiyou kanjian ta ma? Buran! Tamen bu xiwang fuhuo
Dang tamen jian ni de shihou, zhi ba ni dang zuo xiaobing,(tamen shuo):“Zhe jiushi zhenzhu pai lai dang shizhe de ma
Yao bushi women jianchizhe yao chongbai women de shenling, name, ta jihu shi women pianli tamenle.” Tamen kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiangyao zhidao shei shi geng pianli zhenglu de
Ni gaosu wo ba, yi siyu wei qi shenling zhe, ni neng zuo ta de jianhu zhe ma
Nandao ni yi wei tamen daban shi neng tingcong huozhe neng liaojie de ren ma? Tamen zhi xiang shengchu yiyang, tamen shenzhi shi geng mi wu de
Nandao ni meiyou kanjian ni de zhu zenyang shenzhan yinying ma? Jiaruo ta yiyu, ta biding shi yinying chengwei jingzhi de. Wo yi taiyang wei qi biaozhi
ranhou wo zhujian de shouhui yinying
Zhu yi heiye wei nimen de yifu, yi shuimian gong nimen anxi, yi baizhou gong nimen suxing
Zhu zai jiang en zhiqian, shi feng xian lai fu xi. Wo cong yun zhong jiangxia qingjie de yushui
yibian wo jie yushui er shi yi si de dadi fuhuo, bingyong yushui gong wo suo chuangzao de shengchu he renmen zuo yinliao
Wo que yi ba yushui fen pei zai tamen zhi jian, yibian tamen jiyi. Dan tamen daban zhi yuan wang'enfuyi
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi zai mei zuo chengshi zhong paiqian yige jinggao zhe
Suoyi ni buyao shuncong bu xindao zhe, ni yingdang jie ci “gulanjing” er yu tamen nuli fendou.§
Ta jiushi ren liang hai ziyou jiaoliu de, zhe shi hen tian de danshui, na shi hen ku de xian shui; ta zai liang hai zhi jian shezhi pingzhang he difang
Ta jiushi yong jing shui chuangzao ren, shi ren chengwei xuezu he yinqin de. Ni de zhu shi quanneng de
Tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai naxie dui tamen ji wu fu you wu huo de dongxi, bu xindao zhe shi xiezhu taren yi fankang ziji de zhu de
Wo zhi paiqian ni wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe
Ni shuo:“Wo duiyu wancheng zhe xiang shiming, bu xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, dan wang youzhi zhe neng you ci dadao er dadao qi zhuzai.”
Ni yingdang xinren yongsheng bu mie de zhu, ni yingdang zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Ta zuyi che zhi ta de zhong pu de zuiguo
Zai liu rinei chuangzao tiandi wanwu, ranhou sheng shang baozuo de, shi zhiren zhu. Ni yingdang yi ta (de de xing) qingjiao jingming zhe
Ruguo youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen yingdang wei zhiren zhu er koutou.” Tamen jiu shuo:“Zhiren zhu shi shenme? Nandao women yin feng ni de mingling er koutou ma?” Na shi tamen gengjia fangan.※
Shengjie zai zhenzhu! Ta ba xuduo gong zao zai tianshang, youzao mingdeng he canlan de yueliang
Ta jiushi wei yu juewu huo yu ganxie zhe, er shi zhouye gengdie de
Zhiren zhu de puren shi zai dadishang qianxun er xing de; dang yuren yi e yan shanghai tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an.”
Tamen wei tamen de zhu er tongxiao koutou he suli
tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni wei women bi kai huo yu de xingfa. Huo yu de xingfa que shi ling ren feichang tongku de
que shi elie de zhuchu he jusuo.”
Tamen yong qian de shihou, ji bu huihuo, you bu linse, jin shou zhong dao
tamen zhi qidao zhenzhu, bu qidao bie de shenling; tamen bu weibei zhenzhu de jinling er sharen, chufei youyu changming; tamen ye bu tongjian. Shei fan ci lei (zui'e), shei zao chengfa
fuhuo ri yao shou jiabei de xingfa, er shouru de yong ju qizhong
Wei huiguo erqie xindao bingxingshangong zhe, zhenzhu jiang gouxiao qi zuixing, er luqu qi shangong. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
Huiguo erqie xing shan zhe, que yi zhuanxiang zhenzhu
Tamen bu zuo jia jianzheng, tamen ting dao e yan de shihou qianxun de zou kai
Youren yi tamen de zhu de jixiang quan jie tamen de shihou, tingjiang zhe bing bu zhuang long zuo xia de dahan
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yi women de qi zi er nu wei women de anwei, qiu ni yi women wei jingwei zhe de dianfan.”
Zhe deng ren neng jianren, yinci jiang shou gaoji de baochou, tamen zai leyuan li, jiang tingjian zhushou he zhu an
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong. Leyuan shi youmei de zhuchu he jusuo
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo meiyou nimen de qidao, wo de zhu bing bu guanqie nimen, dan nimen ji yi fouren zhenli, gu nimen jiangyao shou wufa jietuo de xingfa.”
Ta xin, mi mu
zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian zhong de jie wen
Yinwei tamen bu xindao, ni huoxu qi de yaosi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo jiang cong tianshang jiang shi tamen yige jixiang, tamen jiu wei ta er fushou tie er
Mei feng you xin de jinian cong zhiren zhu jiang shi tamen, tamen dou beiqi ta
Tamen que yi fouren zhenli, tamen suo chaoxiao de shi de jieju, jiang jianglin tamen
Nandao tamen meiyou guancha da di ma? Wo shi ge zhong youliang de zhiwu zai da dishang fanyan
Ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de
Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de
Dangri, ni de zhu zhaohuan mu sa (shuo):“Ni qu jiaohua na bu yi de minzhong
Ji falao de minzhong. Tamen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo dique pa tamen fouren wo
yizhi wo fanmen kouchi, suoyi qiu ni paiqian ha lun (yidao qu)

Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo

Dangri, tamen de dixiong lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei zhenzhu ne

Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo

Nimen zenme yao yu zhongren zhong de nanxing jiaojie
er sheqi nimen de zhu suo wei nimen chuangzao de qizi ni? Qishi, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong.”

Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne

Gu nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang fucong wo
Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui quan shijie de zhu fudan.§

Nimen buyao kekou taren suo ying de de caiwu. Nimen buyao zai difang shang weifeizuodai, bainong shifei
Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, ta chuangzao nimen he gulao de shidai.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige bei guhuo de ren
Ni zhishi yige xiang women yiyang de fanren. Women dique renwei ni shi yige shuohuang de
Ni shi tian yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xingwei de.”
Tamen fouren ta, tamen jiu zaoshou yinying zhi ri de xingfa. Na que shi zhongda ri de xingfa
Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de

yibian ni jinggao zhongren
yi mingbai de alabo yu

erqie kanjian ni lu zhong libai de zhongzhong dongzuo
