Shirenmen bei mi wu zhe suo gensui
Ni buzhidao ma? Tamen zai ge shangu zhong fanghuang
Tamen zhi shang kongtan, bu chong shijian
Wei xindao er xingshan bing duoduo jinian zhenzhu, erqie zai bei qiya zhihou congshi ziwei de ren chuwai, bu yi zhe, jianglai jiu zhidao tamen huode shenme guisu.§
Ta, xin. Zhexie shi “gulanjing”──panbie zhen wei de jingdian ──de jie wen
shi xinzhe de xiangdao he jiayin
Xindao zhe jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, duxin houshi
Buxin houshi zhe, wo que yi wei tamen er zhuangshile tamen de xingwei, gu tamen shi paihuai qitu de
Zhe deng ren shi ying shou yanxing de, tamen zai houshi shi zui kui she de
Ni que yi feng dao cong zhi rui quanzhi de zhu jiang shi de “gulanjing”
Dangri, mu sa ceng dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, wo jiang cong you huo di difang dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo na yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
Ta daole nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao ta (shuo):“Zai huo de fujin he sizhou de ren, dou meng fu you. Zansong zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu, chaojue wanwu
Mu sa a! Wo que shi zhenzhu ──wanneng de, zhi rui de zhu
Ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba!” Dang ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she shi, jiu zhuanlian taobi, bu gan huigu.“Mu sa a! Buyao weiju, shizhemen zai wo zheli, que shi bu weiju de
Ji xing bu yi, ranhou gaiguo cong shan zhe chuwai, wo (duiyu ta) que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de

Ni bashou charu ni de huai zhong, ranhou, chou chulai ta jiang bailiang liang de, que wu eji. Zhe shi pai ni qu zhaoshi falao he ta de baixing de jiu zhong jixiang zhi yi. Tamen que shi youzui de minzhong.”
Wo de xuduo mingxian jixiang jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi mingxian de moshu.”
Tamen de neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wu de he su lai man, ta lia ceng shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.”
Su lai man ceng jicheng da wu de; ta shuo:“Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.”
Su lai man de dajun ──you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng de ──bei zhaoji dao ta mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de
Dengdao tamen lai daole yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo:“Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun bu zhi bu jue de jianta.”

Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong, qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.”
Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo:“Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma
Wo biding yanli de chengfa ta, huo tuzai ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.”
Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo:“Wo tongxiaole ni bu tongxiao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni
Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo
Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she zhenzhu er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei, mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bushi zunxun zhengdao de
Tamen bu chongbai zhenzhu ──jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui zhe he biaobai zhe de
Zhen zhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”※§
Ta shuo:“Wo yao kan kan ni jiujing shi chengshi de, haishi shuohuang de
Ni ba wo zhe feng xin dai qu tou gei tamen, ranhou, likai tamen, ni shikan tamen ruhe dafu.”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo jie dao yi feng guizhong de xin
Zhe feng xin que shi su lai man ji lai de, zhe feng xin de neirong que shi ‘feng zhiren zhi ci de zhenzhu zhi ming
Nimen buyao dui wo aoman wu li, nimen yingdang lai guishun wo.’”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Guanyu wo de shi, wang nimen chu ge yijian. Wo conglai bu jueding renhe yi jian shi, zhidao nimen zai wo mianqian.”
Tamen shuo:“Women ji you wuli, you you yongqi. Women dui ni wei ming shi cong, qing ni xiang yi xiang, ni yao women zuo shenme.”
Ta shuo:“Guowangmen mei gong ru yige chengshi, bi pohuai qizhong de jianshe, bi shi qizhong guizu bian cheng jianmin, tamen zhexie ren, ye hui zheyang zuo de
Wo biding yao pai ren song liwu qu gei tamen, ranhou, dengdaizhuo kan shi chen dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”
Dang shizhe daole su lai man de mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen zenme yi caichan lai zizhu wo ne? Zhenzhu suo ci wo de, shengguo ta suo ci nimen de. Buran, nimen wei nimen de liwu er yangyang deyi
Ni zhuan huiqu ba, wo biding tongshuai tamen wufa dikang de jundui qu taofa tamen, wo biding ba tamen beijian de zhu chu jingwai, shi tamen chengwei shou lingru de.”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Zai tamen lai guishun wo zhiqian, nimen zhong you shei neng ba ta de baozuo na lai gei wo ne?”
Yige qiangliang de jingling shuo:“Zai ni li xi zhiqian, wo ba ta na lai gei ni. Wo duiyu zhe jian shi, que shi ji shengren, you zhongshi kekao de.”

Na shen zhi tian jing de ren shuo:“Zhuan shunjian, wo jiu ba ta na lai gei ni.” Dang ta kanjian nage baozuo anzhi zai ta mianqian de shihou, ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de zhu de enhui zhi yi, ta yu yi ci shiyan wo, kan wo shi ganxie zhe, haishi gufu zhe. Ganxie zhe, zhi wei ziji de liyi er ganxie; gufu zhe (xuzhi) wo de zhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi zungui de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen ba ta de baozuo gaizhuang yixia, yibian women kan ta neng fou renshi ziji de baozuo.”
Dang ta lai dao de shihou, youren shuo:“Ni de baozuo xiang zheyang ma?” Ta shuo:“Zhe haoxiang shi wo de baozuo.” Zai ta zhiqian, women yi huode zhishi, women yi shi guishun de
Ta she zhenzhu er chongbai de, fang'ai ta, ta ben shi shuyu bu xindao de minzhong

Youren dui ta shuo:“Ni jin na zuo gongdian qu ba!” Dang ta kanjian na zuo gongdian de shihou, ta yiwei gongdian li shi yipian wangyang,(jiu tiqi yishang) luchu ta de liang tiao xiaotui. Ta shuo:“Zhe que shi yong boli zaocheng de guanghua de gongdian.” Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que shi zi qi de, wo (xianzai) genzhe su lai man guishun zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu.”
Wo que yi paiqian sai mo de ren de dixiong ──sa li ha ──qu jiaohua tamen,(shuo):“Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu.” Tamen like fen wei liang pai, huxiang zhenglun
Ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen weisheme zai enhui zhiqian yaoqiu xingfa zaori shixian ne? Nimen zenme bu xiang zhenzhu qiurao, yibian nimen meng zhu de lianmin ne?”
Tamen shuo:“Women wei ni he ni de xintu er zao eyun.” Ta shuo:“Nimen de eyun shi zhenzhu suo zhuchi de. Buran, nimen shi yao shou kaoyan de.”
Dangri, cheng li you jiu huo ren, zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu

tamen shuo:“Nimen zhi zhenzhu huxiang mengshi ba!” Tamen shuo:“Women bi zai yejian mouhai ta he ta de xintu. Ranhou, women bi dui ta de zhu shuo:‘Ta de xintu yuhai de shihou, women meiyou zaichang, women que shi chengshi de ren.’”
Tamen ceng yong yige jimou, wo ye ceng yong yige jimou, dan tamen buzhi bu jue
Ni kan tamen de jimou de jieju shi zenyang de.(Jieguo) shi wo ba tamen he tamen de zongzu, quanti huimiele
Naxie shi tamen de fangwu, yin tamen de bu yi er bian wei tanta de. Duiyu you zhishi de minzhong ci zhong que you yige jixiang
Wo ceng zhengjiule xindao erqie jingwei de renmen
(Wo ceng paiqian) lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen zenme mingmuzhangdan de gan choushi ne
Nimen wubi yao she nuren er yi nanren manzu xingyu ma? Buran, nimen shi wu zhishi de minzhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba lu te de xintu zhu chucheng wai, yinwei tamen shi chunjie de minzhong.” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu
Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de xintu, ta de qizi chuwai, wo yi yuding ta he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa
Wo ceng jiang dayu qu shang tamen. Ceng shou jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zhen elie
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu. Zhu ta suo xuan de zhong pu ping'an.” Jiujing shi zhenzhu geng hao ne? Haishi tamen yong lai pei zhen zhu de geng hao ne

Haishi nei tiandi de chuangzao zhe (geng hao), qie wei nimen cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, yi peizhi meili de yuanpu zhe ne? Er nimen buneng shi yuanpu zhong de shumu shengzhang. Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen shi beimiu de minzhong

Haishi yi dadi wei anju zhi suo, shi zhu heliu guan qijian, shi zhu shan zhenya qi shang, bing zai liang hai zhi jian she yige pingzhang zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Buran, tamen daban buzhidao
Haishi na daying shounan zhe de qidao, er jiechu qi zaihai, qie yi nimen wei dadi de dai zhi zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Nimen hen shao juewu

Haishi na zai lu hai de chongchong hei'an zhong yindao nimen, zai jiang qi enhui zhiqian, shi feng wei chuan jiayin zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Zhenzhu chao hu tamen yong lai pei ta de

Haishi na chuangzao wanwu, ranhou jiayi fu zao, bing cong tianshang dixia gong nimen jiyang zhe ne? Chu zhenzhu wai, nandao huan you ying shou chongbai de ma? Ni shuo:“Nimen na nimen de zhengju lai ba, ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
Ni shuo:“Chu zhenzhu wai, zai tiandi jian, shei ye bu zhi youxuan, tamen bu zhidao shenme shihou fuhuo
Nandao tamen guanyu houshi de zhishi yijing chengshule ma? Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi huaiyi de. Buran, tamen duiyu houshi shi mangmu di.”
Buxindao de ren shuo:“Nandao women he women de zuxian dou bian wei chentu hou hai yao bei fuhuo qilai ma
Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi tingguo zhe yi lei de konghe, zhege zhishi guren de shenhua.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen yingdang zai dimian shang luxing, yin'er guancha fanzui ren de jieju shi zenyang de.”
Ni buyao wei tamen de (beini) er youchou, buyao wei tamen de jimou er fanmen
Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen yaoqiu zaori shixian de, huoxu you yibufen shi linjin nimen de.”
Ni de zhu duiyu shiren, que shi you da en de, dan tamen daban shi bu ganxie de
Ni de zhu, dique zhidao tamen de xiongzhong yinni de he tamen suo biaobai de
Tianshang dixia, meiyou yi jian yin wei de shiwu, bu jilu zai yi ben mingbai de tian jing zhong
Zhe bu “gulanjing”, dique ba yiselie de houyi suo zhenglun de da bu fen de shili gaosu tamen
Zhe bu “gulanjing” duiyu xindao zhe que shi xiangdao he enhui
Ni de zhu, biding wei tamen yizhao ta de jueding er caipan. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi quanzhi de
Ni yingdang xinlai zhenzhu, ni que shi ju you mingbai de zhenli de
Ni biding buneng shi siren ting (ni jiang dao). Ni biding buneng shi tuibi de longzi ting ni zhaohuan
Ni jue buneng yindao xiazi likai mi wu. Ni zhi neng shi xin wo de jixiang de ren, ting ni (jiang dao), tamen yin'er chengyi xindao.§
Dang yuyan dui tamen shixian de shihou, wo wei tamen er shi yi zhong dongwu cong di zhong shengchu, shanghai tamen, yinwei zhongren buxin wo de jixiang
Zai na ri, wo jiang cong mei ge minzu zhong, jihe yiqun bu xin wo de jixiang de ren, er tamen shi bei pailie de zheng zhengqi qi de
Dengdao tamen lai dao (zhenzhu) nali de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen meiyou chedi zhidao wo de jixiang jiu jiayi fouren ma? Nimen jiujing zuole shenme ne?”
Yuyan jiang dui tamen de bu yi er dui tamen shixian, suoyi tamen ya kou wu yan
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Wo yi heiye zuo tamen de anxi shijian, yi baizhou zuo tamen guankan de shijian, duiyu xindao de minzhong qizhong que you xuduo jixiang
Zai na ri, jiang chui haojiao, chu zhenzhu suo yiyu de wai, fan zai tianshang dixia de dou yao kongbu, ge ge dou yao beijian de lai dao zhenzhu nali
Ni jian qun shan er yiwei dou shi guding de, qishi qun shan du xiang xing yun yang shiqu. Na shi jingzhi wanwu de zhenzhu de huagong, ta que shi che zhi nimen de xingwei de
Xingshan de ren jiang huode geng jia de baochou, zai na ri, tamen jiang mian yu kongbu
Zuo e de ren, jiang pufuzhe touru huo yu:“Nimen zhi shou nimen de xingwei de baochou.”
(Ni shuo):“Wo zhi fengming chongbai zhe chengshi de zhu, ta ceng yi zhe chengshi wei jindi. Wanwu dou shi ta suoyou de. Wo yi fengming zuo yige guishun de ren
bing xuandu “gulanjing”.” Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru qitu, ni dui shei shuo:“Wo zhishi yige jinggao zhe.”
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu, ta jiang xianshi gei nimen ta de jixiang, nimen jiu renshi ta. Ni de zhu, bing bu hushi nimen de xingwei.”
Ta, xin, mi mu
Zhexie shi mingbai de jingdian de jie wen
Wo benzhe zhenli, wei xindao de minzhong er dui ni xushu mu sa he falao de shiji
Falao que yi zai guo zhong aoman, ta ba guomin fencheng xuduo zongpai, er qifu qizhong de yipai ren; tusha tamen de nanhai, baoquan tamen de nuhai. Ta que shi shangfengbaisu de
Wo yao ba endian shangci gei da dishang shou qifu de ren, wo yao yi tamen wei biaoshuai, wo yao yi tamen wei jicheng zhe
wo yao shi tamen zai da dishang deshi, wo yao zhaoshi falao, ha man he tamen lia de jundui, duiyu zhexie bei qifu zhe suo tifang de shi

Wo ceng qishi mu sa de muqin (shuo):“Ni yingdang buru ta, dang ni pa ta shouhai de shihou, ni ba ta tou zai he li, ni buyao weiju, buyao youchou, wo biding yao ba ta song hai ni, wo biding yao renming ta wei shizhe.”
Falao de shicong ceng shiqule ta, yizhi ta chengwei tamen de diren he youhuan. Falao, ha man he ta lia de jundui, que shi cuowu de
Falao de qizi shuo:“(Zhe) shi wo he ni de weiji. Nimen buyao sha ta, yexu ta you liyu women, huozhe women ba ta shou wei yi zi.”(Tamen tingcong ta dehua), tamen buzhi bu jue
Mu sa de muqin de xin, bian cheng kongxu de. Ruo bushi wo shi ta an xiaxin lai, yi shi ta chengwei xindao de ren, ta jihu baolu zhenqingle
Ta dui ta de jiejie shuo:“Ni zhuizhe ta qu ba.” Ta jiu yuan yuan di kuice ta, tamen hao bu zhijue.§
Yiqian, wo jinzhi ta chi renhe ren de nai, ta de jiejie jiu shuo:“Wo jieshao nimen yijia ren, ti nimen yangyu ta, tamen shi zhongyu ta, hao ma?”
Yushi, wo ba ta song hai ta de muqin, yibian ta huode wei ji, bu zai youchou, erqie zhidao zhenzhu de yingxu shi zhenshi de, dan tamen daban bu zhidao
Dang ta tige qiangzhuang, zhili jianquan de shihou, wo shangci ta zhihui he xueshi. Wo yao zheyang baochou shanren

Cheng cheng li de ren shuhu de shihou, ta zou jin cheng lai, jiu zai cheng li faxianle liang geren zhengzai zhengdou, zhege shi shuyu ta de zongzu, nage shi shuyu ta de diren. Shuyu tongzu de ren yaoqiu ta bangzhe duifu ta de diren, mu sa jiu ba na diren yi quan da si. Ta shuo:“Zhe shi youyu emo de youhuo, emo que shi miren de ming di.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi zi qile, qiu ni raoshu wo ba.” Zhen zhu jiu raoshule ta, ta que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo jie ni suo ci wo de endian er qiu ni baoyou wo, wo jue bu zuo fanzui zhe de zhushou.”
Ci ri zaochen, ta zai cheng li zhanzhanjingjing de. Zuori xiang ta qiujiu di nageren huran you xiang ta gao sheng qiujiu. Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Ni que shi mingxian de mi wu zhe.”
Dang ta yu pu ji ta lia de diren de shihou, qiujiu di nage ren shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni yao xiang zuori sharen yiyang sha wo ma? Ni zhi xiang zuo zhe difang de baonue zhe, que buxiang zuo tiaojie zhe.”
Youyige ren, cong cheng de ji yuan chu mang lai shuo:“Mu sa a! Chen pumen dique zhengzai shangyi yao sha ni, ni kuai chuzou ba. Wo que shi zhongyu ni de.”
Ta jiu cong cheng li zhanzhanjingjing de tao chulaile, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo tuo li bu yi de minzhong.”
Dang ta yi quxiang mai de yan de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu yexu zhishi wo zhengdao.”

Dang ta lai dao mai de yan de quan bian de shihou, ta kanjian you yiqun ren zai nali yin yang. Ta faxian chu tamen wai hai you liang nuzi, lanzhe tamen lia de yang qun. Ta shuo:“Nimen lia weisheme zheyang ne?” Ta lia shuo:“Women yao dao mu renmen shi tamen de yang likai quanshui, cai de yin women de yang, women de fuqin shi yi wei long zhong de laoren.”
Ta jiu ti tamen lia yin yang, ranhou tui dao shu yin xia, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que xuqiu ni suo jiang gei wo de renhe fuli de.”

Na liang ge nuzi zhong de yige, xiuse de lai dui ta shuo:“Wo de fuqin dique yao qing ni qu, yao chouxie ni ti women yin yang de gonglao.” Dang ta lai dao ta mianqian, bingqie gaosu ta ziji de shiqing de shihou, ta shuo:“Ni buyao weiju, ni yi tuo li bu yi de minzhongle.”
Na liang ge nuzi zhong de yi ge shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Qing ni guyong ta. Ni zui hao guyong zhege you qiangzhuang you zhongshi de ren.”

Ta shuo:“Wo biding yi wo de zhe liang ge nu'er zhong de yige jia gei ni, dan ni bixu ti wo zuo ba nian gong. Ruguo ni zuo man shi nian, na shi ni ziyuan de, wo bu yuan keqiu yu ni. Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi yige shanren.”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo yu ni suo ding de hetong, wo wulun zuo man na yige qixian duiyu wo du buke you guofen de yaoqiu. Zhenzhu shi jiancha women de yue yan de.”§

Dang mu sa yi zuo man qixian, er daizhe ta de jiashu luxing de shihou, ta kanjian na zuo shan de zhe bian youyi chu huoguang, ta dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Nimen dengdai yixia, wo que yi kanjian yi chu huoguang, yexu wo cong huoguang di nali dai yige xiaoxi lai gei nimen, huo dai yige huoba lai gei nimen kaohuo.”
Ta yi lai dao nage huoguang de fujin, shangu de you'an shang, you conglin de jixiang chu, fachu husheng shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo que shi zhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu
ni pao xia ni de shouzhang ba.” Ta kanjian na tiao shouzhang wan yan ru she, jiu zhuanlian tuibi, bu gan zhuan huiqu.“Mu sa, ni zouxiang qian lai, buyao weiju, ni que shi anquan de

ni ba ni de shou charu huai zhong, ta jiang bailiang liang de chou chulai, que wu eji. Ni wei kongbu er ba ni de shou suo huiqu ba. Zhe liang jian shi ni de zhu suo jiang shi falao he ta de chen pumen de zhengju, tamen que shi fangdang de minzhong.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo que yi shaguo tamen zhong de yige ren, suoyi wo pa tamen sha wo
Wo di gege ha lun, koucai bi wo hao, qiu ni pai ta tong wo qu, zuo wo de zhushou, zhengshi wo de shiming; wo dique pa tamen fouren wo.”

Zhenzhu shuo:“Wo jiang yi ni di gege zhu ni yibizhili, wo yao gei nimen lia yi zhong quanli, suoyi tamen buneng shanghai nimen lia. Nimen lia he shuncong nimen lia de, jiang jie wo de jixiang er wei shengli zhe.”

Dang mu sa yi daizhe wo de xuduo mingxian de jixiang lai dao tamen mianqian de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhege zhishi niezao de moshu, women meiyou tingjian zai women de zuxian (de shidai) you zhe jian dongxi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao shei dai laile cong ta nali jianglin de zhengdao, shei de xiangshou houshi de shan guo. Bu yi de ren biding bu hui chenggong.”

Falao shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo bu zhidao chu wo wai hai you bie de shenling. Ha man a! Ni yingdang ti wo shao zhuan, ranhou ti wo jianzhu yizuo gaolou, yexu wo de kuijian mu sa de zhuzai. Wo dique caixiang ta shi yige shuohuang zhe.”
Ta he ta de jundui, zai guo zhong wangzizunda, tamen caixiang ziji bu bei zhao guiyu wo
Wo jiu chengzhi ta he ta de jundui, ba tamen touru haizhong. Ni kan kan bu yi zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Wo yi tamen wei zhao ren yu huo yu de zuikui, fuhuo ri, tamen jiang bu huo yuanzhu
Zai jinshi wo shi zu ma zhuisui tamen; fuhuo ri, tamen jiang bian cheng chou'e de
Zai huimie yuangu de ge shidai zhihou, wo que yi ba jingdian shangci mu sa, yi zuo shiren de mingzheng, xiangdao he enhui, yibian tamen jinian
Dang wo yi wo de mingling qishi mu sa de shihou, ni meiyou zai xishan bian, ye meiyou qinyan kanjian
Dan wo ceng chuangzaole xuduo shidai, naxie shidai cengjingguo manchang de suiyue. Ni meiyou juzhu zai mai de yan ren zhi jian, dui tamen xuandu wo de jixiang, dan wo shi paiqian shizhe de

Dang wo zhaohuan (mu sa) de shihou, ni meiyou zai shan bian, dan zhe shi cong ni de zhu jiangxia de enhui, yibian ni jinggao zai ni zhiqian meiyou renhe jinggao zhe ceng jianglin tamen di naxie minzhong, yibian tamen jinian
Ruo bu wei tamen jianglai yao wei cengjing fanzui er zaoyang, bingqie shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni zenme bu pai yige shizhe lai jiaohua women, shi women de zunshou ni de jixiang, er wei xinshi ne?……”

Dang wo suo qishi de zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Ta weisheme buneng huode xiang mu sa suo huode de jixiang ne?” Nandao tamen meiyou fouren yiqian mu sa suo huode de jixiang ma? Tamen ceng shuo:“Liang zhong huxiang yinzheng de moshu.” Tamen ceng shuo:“Women biding yigai dou buxin.”
Ni shuo:“Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren, name, nimen na yi bu jingdian lai, zhiyao shi zhenzhu suo qishi de, bingqie shi bi zhe liang bu jingdian geng neng yindao renlei de, wo jiu zunshou ta.”

Ruguo tamen bu daying ni, name, ni yingdang zhidao tamen zhishi shuncong ziji de siyu. She zhenzhu suo qishi de zhengdao, er shuncong ziji de siyu zhe, you shei bi ta geng mi wu ne? Zhenzhu biding bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.§
Wo que yi xu shi zhenyan, yibian tamen jinian
Zai qishi zhe zhenyan zhiqian, ceng meng wo shangci tian jing de ren, shi quexin zhe zhenyan de
Dang youren dui tamen xuandu zhe zhenyan de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women quexin zhe zhenyan, ta que shi cong women de zhu jiang shi de, zai jiang shi ta zhiqian, women que shi guishun de.”
Zhe deng ren, yin neng jianren, qie neng yidebaoyuan, bing fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de, gu de jiabei de baochou
Dang tamen ting dao e yan de shihou, liji tuibi, tamen shuo:“Women you women de xingwei, nimen you nimen de xingwei. Zhu nimen ping'an! Women bu qiu yuren de youyi.”
Ni biding buneng shi ni suo xi'ai de ren zunxun zhengdao, zhenzhu que neng shi tasuo yiyu de ren zunxun zhengdao, ta zhidao shei shi zunxun zhengdao zhe

Tamen shuo:“Ruguo women yu ni gongtong zunshou zhengdao, women jiang bei quzhu chujing.” Nandao wo meiyou wei tamen er sheli yige anquan de jindi ma? Ge zhong de guoshi, dou fanyun dao jindi zhong lai, na shi cong wo jiangxia de jiyang, dan tamen daban bu zhidao

Wo ceng huimie xuduo chengshi, naxie chengshi li de jumin,guo yi zhong jiao she de shenghuo. Zhexie shi tamen de juzhu di, cong tamen miewang zhihou, chu hen shao de shijian wai, wu ren juzhu; wo shi tamen de jicheng zhe

Ni de zhu, bu hui huimie ge chengshi, zhidao ta zai shou yi zhong paiqian yige shizhe, dui ge chengshi de jumin xuandu ta de jixiang. Wo bu hui huimie ge chengshi, chufei chengshi li de jumin duo xing bu yi
Nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de jiyang he zhuangshi, zai zhenzhu nali de (baochou) shi geng youliang de, shi geng changjiu de. Nandao nimen bu lijie ma
Dedao wo di meihao de yingxu, er jiang huode shihui de ren, yu zai jinshi shenghuo zhong huode wo de jiyang er zai fuhuo ri bei chuanhuan zhe, bici xiangsi ma
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangcheng wo de huoban zhe, rujin zai nali ne?”

Shou panjue de renmen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women ceng shi zhexie ren mi wu, guran women mi wu tamen, dan tamen xiang women ziji yiyang mi wule. Women xiang ni shengming: Women yu tamen wugan, tamen meiyou chongbai women.”

Jiang yong shengyin zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen ba nimen de pei zhu zhaohuan lai ba!” Tamen jiu zhaohuan tamen, dan tamen bu daying, tamen ziji kanjian xingfa, jiu xiwang tamen shengqian shi zunxun zhengdao de
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suoyong yi dafu shizhemen de shi shenme ne?”
Zai na ri, yiqie zhengju jiang dui tamen bian cheng aimei de, suoyi tamen bu xiang xunwen
Zhiyu huizui, xindao he xingshan de ren, huoxu shi chenggong de
Ni de zhu, chuangzao tasuo yiyu de, xuanze tasuo yiyu de, tamen meiyou xuanze de quanli. Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta chao hu tamen suoyong lai pei ta de
Ni de zhu zhidao tamen de xiongzhong suo yincang de he tamen (de koutou) suo biaobai de
Ta shi zhenzhu, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, jinshi houshi de zansong quan gui ta, panjue zhi you ta zuochu. Nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo zhenzhu shi heiye wei nimen yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu zhenzhu wai, na yige shenling neng ba guangming dai lai gei nimen ne? Nandao nimen bu hui tinghua ma?”

Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo zhenzhu shi baizhou wei nimen yanchang dao fuhuo ri, name, chu zhenzhu wai, na yige shenling neng ba heiye dai lai gei nimen, yibian nimen anxi ne? Nandao nimen bu hui guancha ma?”
Ta wei lianxu nimen er wei nimen chuangzao heiye he baizhou, yibian nimen zai heiye anxi, er zai baizhou xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan tamen shuo:“Nimen suo wangcheng wei wo de huoban de, rujin zai nali ne?”
Wo jiang cong mei yige minzu zhong xuanba yige zhengren, bingqie shuo:“Nimen ba nimen de zhengju na lai ba!” Tamen cai zhidao zhenli shi zhenzhu de, tamen shengqian suo weizao de, yi huibi tamenle.§

Ge lun dique shuyu mu sa de zongzu, dan ta nuedai tamen. Wo ceng shangci ta xuduo caibao, naxie caibao de yaoshi shi ji ge lishi suo buneng sheng ren de. Dangri, ta de zongzu dui ta shuo:“Buyao kuangxi, zhenzhu que shi bu ai kuangxi zhe

Ni yingdang jie zhenzhu shangci ni de caifu er ying mou houshi de zhuzhai, ni buyao wangque ni zai jinshi de ding fen. Ni dang yi shandai ren, xiang zhenzhu yi shandai ni yiyang. Ni buyao zai difang shang bainong shifei, zhenzhu que shi bu ai bainong shifei zhe.”

Ta shuo:“Wo huode zhe xiang caifu, zhishi yinwei wo you teshu de zhishi bale.” Nandao ta bu zhidao ma? Zai ta zhiqian, zhenzhu suo huimie de ge shidai de eren, you bi ta nengli geng qiang, jixu geng duo de. Fanzui de ren, shi bubi jiayi shenwen de
Ge lun ceng shengzhuang chuyou, yi haohua kuashi ziji de zongzu. Ai jinshi shenghuo de ren shuo:“Dan yuan women huode ge lun suo huode de (caifu), ta que shi you dafu fen de.”
You xueshi de ren shuo:“Shang zai nimen! Zhenzhu de baochou, duiyu xindao erqie xingshan de ren shi geng hao de, zhiyou jianren de ren de xiangshou na zhong baochou.”
Wo shi ta he ta de fangwu lunxian zai dimian xia, ta meiyou dangyu xiezhu ta dikang zhenzhu, ta ye buneng ziwei

Zuotian xianmu ge lun de jingyu de ren shuo:“Ni bujian ma? Zhenzhuyao shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu;(yao shi nage puren de jiyang jiongpo), jiu shi ta jiongpo. Zhenzhu de jixiang jiang shi ni zhihou, ni jue buyao ren tamen fang'ai ni xuanyang naxie jixiang. Ni yingdang zhao ren lai guishun ni de zhu, ni jue buyao zuo yi wu pei zhu zhe
Chu zhenzhu wai, ni buyao qidao bie de renhe shenling, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Chu ta de benti wai, wanwu dou yao huimie. Panjue zhi you ta zuochu, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.§

Wo ceng ming ren xiaojing fumu;“ruguo ta lia leling ni yong ni suo bu zhidao de dongxi pei wo, name, ni buyao fucong ta lia. Nimen yao guiyu wo, wo yao ba nimen de xingwei gaosu nimen.”

Wo que yi pai nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, ta zai tamen zhi jian, douliule jiubai wushi nian, hongshui jiu xijile tamen, yinwei tamen shi bu yi de

Ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen sha si ta, huo shao si ta ba!” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu. Zhenzhu zhengjiu ta tuoli liehuo, duiyu xindao de minzhong, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang

Lu te jiu wei ta er xindao. Yi bo la xin shuo:“Wo biding qianyi dao wo de zhu nali qu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de.”
Wo shangci ta yi si ha ge he ye er gu bai, wo yi yuyan he tian jing shangci ta de houyi, wo ba ta zai jinshi de baochou shangci ta, zai houshi bi zai shanren zhi lie
(Wo ceng paiqian) lu te, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:“Nimen dique gan choushi, zai nimen zhiqian, quan shijie de ren meiyouyige ganguo zhe zhong choushi de
Nimen wubi yao jiang nan zuo nu, lanlu zuo'e, dangzhong xuan yin ma?” Ta de zongzu shuo:“Ni ba zhenzhu de xingfa zhaoshi women ba, ruguo ni shi chengshi de ren.” Zhe shi tamen weiyi de dafu
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhu wo, yi duikang shangfengbaisu de renmen.”
Dang wo de shizhe daizhe jiayin laifang yi bo la xin de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women biding huimie zhege chengshi de jumin. Zhege chengshi de jumin, que shi bu yi de.”

Ta shuo:“Lu te dique zai zhege chengshi li.” Tamen shuo:“Women zhidao zai zhege chengshi li de ren, women biding yao zhengjiu ta he ta de xintu, ta de qizi chuwai, ta shi he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa de.”

Dang wo de shizhe laifang lu te de shihou, ta wei tamen er youchou, ta wufa baohu tamen. Tamen shuo:“Ni buyao haipa, buyao youchou, women biding zhengjiu ni he ni de xintu, ni de qizi chuwai, ta shi he qiyu de ren tong shou xingfa de.”
Wo bi shi tianzai cong tiankong jiang yu zhege chengshi de jumin, na shi youyu tamen di fangdang
Wo que yi wei neng liaojie de minzhong, er jiang zhege chengshi de yizhi liuzhe zuo yige mingxian de jixiang
(Wo ceng paiqian) shu a bo qu jiaohua mai de yan ren, ta jiu shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen yingdang chongbai zhenzhu, yingdang weiju mori, buyao zai difang shang wei fei zuo dai, bainong shifei.”
Dan tamen fouren ta, dizhen jiu xijile tamen. Qingke zhi jian, tamen dou jiang wo zai ge ren de jiazhong

(Wo ceng huimie) a de ren he sai mo de ren, nimen cong tamen juzhu di difang, que yi mingbai tamen bei huimie de qingxing. Emo yi tamen de xingwei, mihuo tamen er zu'ai tamen zunxun zhengdao, tamen yuanlai shi neng siwei de
(Wo ceng huimie) ge lun, falao he ha man. Mu sa ceng zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng, dan tamen zai difang shang zi da, tamen wei neng taobi tianqian

Mei yige ren, wo du yin ta de zuiguo er jiayi chengfa, tamen zhong you wo ceng shi feishazoushi de baofeng qu shanghai de, you wei kongbu suo xiji de, you wo shi ta lunxian zai dimian xia de, you bei wo ni sha de, zhenzhu buzhi kui wang tamen, dan tamen kui wangle ziji
Youxie ren, she zhenzhu er bie qiu jianhu zhe, tamen piru zhizhu zao wu, zui cuiruo de fangwu, que shi zhizhu de fangwu. Jiaruo tamen renshi zhege daoli,(jiu bu hui chongbai ouxiangle)
Zhenzhu dique zhidao tamen she ta er qidao de renhe wu, ta shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
Zhexie piyu, shi wo wei zhongren er she de, zhiyou xuezhe neng liaojie ta

Ni yingdang xuandu qishi ni de jingdian, ni dang jin shou bai gong, bai gong dique neng fangzhi choushi he zui'e, jinian zhenzhu que shi yi jian geng da de shi. Zhenzhu zhidao nimen de zuo wei

Wo zheyang ba jingdian jiang shi ni, meng wo shangci jingdian de ren, dou quexin ta. Zhe deng ren zhong, yeyou quexin ta de, zhiyou buxindao de ren, fouren wo de jixiang

Tamen shuo:“Zenme meiyou yi zhong jixiang cong ta de zhu jianglin ta ne?” Ni shuo:“Jixiang zhi zai zhenzhu nali, wo zhishi yige tanshuai de jinggao zhe.”
Wo jiang shi ni zhe bu jingdian, keyi dui tamen changchang xuandu, nandao hai buneng shi tamen manyi ma? Zai zhe jingdian li duiyu xindao de ren que you enhui he jinian
Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu zuo wo he ni zhi jian de jianzheng yijing goule. Ta zhidao tiandi jian de yiqie, quexin xieshen er buxin zhenzhu zhe, que shi kui she de.”
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa, jiaruo meiyou dingqi, name xingfa bi yi jianglin tamen. Dang tamen buzhi bu jue de shihou, xingfa biding huran jianglin tamen
Tamen yaoqiu ni zaori zhaoshi xingfa. Huo yu biding shi baowei bu xindao zhe de

tamen shi jianren de, tamen zhi xintuo tamen de zhu

Ta lianmin nimen, ta de tianshenmen wei nimen qidao, yibian ta jiang nimen cong chongchong hei'an yinru guangming, ta shi lianmin xinshi di
Tamen yu zhenzhu huijian di neitian, zhenzhu dui tamen de zhuci shi shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an.” Ta yi wei tamen yubeile youhou de baochou
Xianzhi a! Wo que yi paiqian ni wei jianzheng zhe, wei baoxi zhe, wei jinggao zhe
wei feng zhenzhu zhi ming er zhao ren yu zhenzhu zhe, wei canlan de mingdeng
Ni yingdang xiang xinshimen baoxi, tamen jiang huode cong zhenzhu jiangxia de hong en
Ni buyao shuncong buxinzhe he wei xin zhe, ni yingdang ren sui tamen ruma, ni yingdang xinren zhenzhu, zhenzhu zu wei jianhu zhe

Xindao de renmen a! Nimen ruo qu xindao de funu, ranhou zai jiaojie qian xiule tamen, name, tamen bu gai wei nimen er shou xianqi, suoyi nimen yingdang shi tamen xiangshou, yingdang rang tamen yi li er li qu

Xianzhi a! Wo que yi zhun ni xiangshou ni jiyu pinli de qizi, ni de nubi, ji zhenzhu yiwei ni de zhanlipin de, ni de cong fu de nu'er, ni de gumu de nu'er, ni de jiufu de nu'er, ni de yimu de nu'er, tamen shi tong ni yidao qianju de. Xindao de funu, ruo jiang zishen zengyu xianzhi, ruo xianzhi yuanyi qu ta, zhe shi texu ni de, xinshimen bude yuanli ──wo zhidao wo wei tamen de qizi yu nubi er dui tamen zuo chu de guiding ──yimian ni ganshou kunnan. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.§

Ni keyi renyi di li jue tamen zhong de renhe ren, ye keyi renyi di wanliu tamen zhong de renhe ren. Ni suo zan li de qizi, ni xiang zhaohui ta, duiyu ni shi hao wu zuiguo de. Na shi zuijin yu shi tamen gandao anwei er wu bei'ai de, bingqie dou manyi ni suo jiyu tamen de. Zhenzhu zhidao nimen de xinshi, zhenzhu shi quanzhi de, shi zhi rui de
Yihou bu zhun ni zai qu funu, ye bu zhun ni yi tamen huan diao bie de qizi, jishi ni xianmu tamen di meimao, chufei shi ni de nubi. Zhenzhu shi jianshi wanwu de

Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao jin xianzhi de jia, chufei yaoqing nimen qu chifan de shihou; nimen buyao jinqu deng fan shu, dao zhao nimen qu de shihou cai jinqu; ji chi zhihou jiu dang gaotui, buyao liulian xianhua, yinwei na hui shi xianzhi gandao nanweiqing de, dan ta bu haoyisi citui nimen. Zhenzhu shi bu chi yu jieshi zhenli de. Nimen xiang xianzhi de qizimen suoqu renhe wupin de shihou, yingdang zai weimu wai suoqu, na duiyu nimen de xin he tamen de xin shi geng qingbai de. Nimen buyi shi zhenzhu de shizhe nanweiqing, zai ta zhihou, yong buyi qu ta de qizi, yinwei zai zhenzhu kan lai, na shi yi jian dazui
Ruguo nimen xian lou yi jian shi, huo yinni ta,(zhenzhu zong shi zhidao de), yin wei zhenzhu que shi quanzhi wanwu de
Tamen wufang huijian tamen de fuqin, erzi, dixiong, zhizi, waisheng, xindao de funu, he ziji de nubi. Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi jianzheng wanwu de
Zhenzhu dique lianmin xianzhi, ta de tianshenmen dique wei ta zhufu. Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang wei ta zhufu, yingdang zhu ta ping'an
Feibang zhenzhu he shizhe de ren, zhen zhu zai jinshi he houshi bi qi jue tamen, bing wei tamen yubei lingru de xingfa
Yi xinshimen hexin numen suo wei fan de zui'e feibang tamen zhe, que yi danfu wumie he mingxian de zui'e

Xianzhi a! Ni yingdang dui ni de qizi, ni de nu'er he xinshimen de funu shuo:“Jiao tamen yingdang yong waiyi mengzhe ziji de shenti.” Zheyang zuo zui rongyi shi ren renshi tamen, er bu shou qinfan. Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de.§
Wei xin de, xinzhong you bing de, zai chengzhong shanhuo renxin de, ruguo tamen reng bu baxiu, wo bi ming ni zhicai tamen, tamen jiu bude jiuju chengzhong yu ni wei linle
Tamen jiang bei qi jue, wulun tamen zai nali pi fa xian, jiu zai nali bei daibu, er bei chusi
Zhe shi zhenzhu duiyu guren de changdao, duiyu zhenzhu de changdao, ni jue buneng faxian renhe biangeng
Zhongren wen ni fuhuo shi zai shenme shihou? Ni shuo:“Na zhiyou zhenzhu cai zhidao.” Shenme shi ni zhidao ta he shi fasheng ne? Fuhuo shi, huoxu shi hen jin de
Zhenzhu que yi qi jue buxindao zhe, bing wei tamen yubei liehuo
Tamen jiang yong ju qizhong, buneng dedao renhe baohu zhe, ye buneng dedao renhe yuanzhu zhe
Tamen de mianpi zai huo zhong bei fanzhuan zhi ri, tamen jiang shuo:“Dan yuan women ceng fucong zhenzhu, fucong shizhe!”
Tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women que yi fucong women de lingxiu he women de weiren, er tamen shi women weibei zhengdao
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni yong jiabei de xingfa chuzhi tamen, qiu ni yanli de qi jue tamen.”
Xinshimen a! Nimen buyao fangxiao yuan wu mu sa de renmen. Zhenzhu yi wei ta xi xueyuan wu, ju zhenzhu kan lai, ta shi you mianzi de
Xinshimen a! Nimen yingdang jingwei zhenzhu, yingdang shuo zheng hua
Ta jiu gaishan nimen de xingwei, jiu she you nimen de zuiguo. Fucong zhenzhu ji qi shizhe de ren, que yi huode weida de chenggong
Wo que yi jiang zhongren xintuo tiandi he shanyue, dan tamen bu ken chengdan ta, tamen weiju ta, er ren que chengdanle ta ──ren que shi bu yi de, que shi wuzhi de
yizhi zhenzhu chengfa wei xin de nannu he yi wu pei zhu de nannu, er she you xindao de nannu! Zhenzhu shi zhi she de, shi zhi ci de
Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Houshi de zansong, zhi guiyu ta. Ta shi zhi rui de, shi che zhi de
Ta zhidao qianru dixia de, cong dixia fachu de, cong tianshang jiangxia de, sheng dao tianshang de. Ta shi zhi ci de, shi zhi she de

Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Fuhuo shi bu hui lailin women.” Ni shuo:“Buran. Zhi wo de zhu fashi, ta bi lailin nimen. Wo de zhu shi quanzhi youxuan de, tiandi jian wei chen zhong de shiwu, buneng yuanli ta; bi na geng xiao de, he geng da de, wu yi jian bu jilu zai yi ben mingbai de jingdian zhong.”
Yibian ta (zai fuhuo shi) baochou xindao er xingshan de renmen. Zhe deng ren, jiang huo she youhe youhou de jiyang
Jieli fandui wo de jixiang de renmen, jiang shou tongku de xingfa
You xueshi de renmen, zhidao cong ni de zhu jiang shi ni de jingdian, que shi zhenli, neng zhishi (shiren zou shang) wanneng de, ke song de zhu de dadao
Bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Women zhishi nimen yige ren hao ma? Ta hui gaosu nimen, dang nimen bei fensui zhihou, nimen biding yao bei zaizao
Ta jiajie zhen zhu de mingyi er niezao ne? Haishi ta you feng bing?” Buran! Bu xin houshi de renmen shi zai xingfa he shen shen de mi wu zhong

Nandao tamen meiyou guancha zai tamen shangmian he xiamian de tiandi ma? Ruguo wo yiyu, wo bi shi tamen lunxian zai dimian xia, huo shi tian yikuai yikuai di luo zai tamen de tou shang. Zai na limian, duiyu mei yige guiyi de puren, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang.§
Wo que yi shangci da wu de cong wo fachu de enhui. Qun shan a! Zhong niao a! Nimen yingdang hezhe ta zansong, wo wei ta shi tie rouruan
(wo dui ta shuo: )“Ni yingdang zhizao wanshan de kaijia, ni yingdang dinghao kaijia de kuandu. Nimen ying dang xingshan, wo que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de.”

Wo ceng shi feng gong su lai man qushi, feng zai shangwu luxing yi yue de lucheng, zai xiawu ye luxing yi yue de lucheng. Wo wei ta shi rong tong xiang quanshui yiyang yong chu. Youxie jingling feng zhu de mingling zai ta de mianqian gongzuo; shei weibeile wo de mingling, wo jiu shi shei changshi liehuo de xingfa

Tamen wei ta xiujian tasuo yu xiujian de gongdian, diaoxiang, shuichi ban de dapan, guding de da guo.(Wo shuo):“Da wu de de jiashu a! Nimen yingdang ganxie.” Wo de puren zhong, ganxie zhe shi hen shao de

Wo jueding ta siwang de shihou, zhiyou chi ta de shouzhang de zhu chong, zhishi tamen ta yijing sile. Dang ta dao xia de shihou, jinglingmen huangrandawu: Jiaruo tamen neng zhi youxuan, name, tamen weiceng douliu zai lingru de xingfa zhong

Sai bo yi zu, zai tamen de ju chu, que youyi zhong jixiang: Liang ge yuanpu, fen lie zuoyou.“Nimen keyi chi nimen de zhu de jiyang, nimen yao ganxie ta. Yige feimei di difang, yige zhi she de zhuzai.”
Suihou, tamen beini, suoyi wo shi shuiku de jiliu qu yanmo tamen, wo ba tamen de liang ge yuanpu, bian cheng liang ge zhi shengzhang kuguo, chengliu he xiewei de suanzao shu de yuanpu
Wo yin tamen de wang'en er yi zhe baochou tamen, wo zhi chengfa wang'en de ren
Wo zai tamen yu wo suo fu you di naxie chengshi zhi jian, jianshele xuduo xian zhe de chengshi, wo jun fen ge zhan jian de juli.“Nimen zai qijian ping'an di luxing ruogan zhouye ba!”

Ranhou, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni fang zhang ge zhan zhi jian de juli.” Tamen zi qi, suoyi wo yi tamen wei tan zhu. Wo shi tamen liulishisuo. Zai nalimian, duiyu mei ge duo ren duoxie de ren, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Yi bo lie si que yi faxian ta dui tamen de caice shi zhengque de, yinwei tamen dou zhuisui ta; zhiyou yi huo xinshi chuwai
Ta dui tamen suoyi you quanli zhe, zhi wei wo yao bianbie shei shi xinyang houshi de, shei shi huaiyi houshi de. Ni de zhu, shi wanwu de jianhu zhe

Ni shuo:“Nimen she zhenzhu er ren zuo shenling de, nimen qidao tamen ba! Tamen buneng guanli tiandi jian wei chen zhi zhong de shiwu, tamen sihao buneng canyu tiandi de zaohua. Zhenzhu bu yi tamen zhong de renhe yige wei zhushou.”

Chu zhenzhu suo xuke zhe wai, zai zhenzhu nali, shuo qing jiang wu biyi. Zhidao tamen xinzhong de kongju bei paichu de shihou, tamen cai shuo:“Nimen de zhu shuole shenme?” Tamen shuo:“Zhenli.” Ta que shi zhizun de, que shi zhi da de.§
Ni shuo:“Shei cong tianshang he dixia gongji nimen?” Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu. Women huo nimen que shi zai zhengdao shang de, huo shi zai xianzhu de mi wu zhong de.”
Ni shuo:“Duiyu women suo fan de zui, nimen bu shoushen wen; duiyu nimen suo zuo de shi, women ye bu shoushen wen.”
Ni shuo:“Women de zhu, jiang zhaoji women, ranhou, yi zhenli er wei women caipan, ta que shi zui shanyu caipan de, que shi quanzhi de.”
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo, nimen suo cheng wei ta de huoban de.” Jue bushi de. Buran, ta shi zhenzhu, shi wanneng de, shi zhi rui de
Wo zhi paiqian ni wei quan renlei de baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe, dan shiren daban bu zhidao
Tamen shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, zhege jinggao shenme shihou shixian ne?”
Ni shuo:“Nimen de yue qi shi you shi ri de, nimen bude shaoshao chidao, ye bude shaoshao zao dao.”

Buxindao de renmen shuo:“Women jue buxin zhe “gulanjing”, ye buxin yiqian de jingdian.” Jiaruo ni de jian bu yi de renmen bei juliu zai tamen de zhu na li de shihou, tamen huxiang bianbo, bei qifu de renmen jiang dui jiao'ao de renmen shuo:“Jiaruo meiyou nimen, women biding shi xindao de.”
Jiao'ao de renmen jiang dui bei qifu de renmen shuo:“Dang zhengdao lailin nimen de shihou, women ceng fang'ai nimen zunxun zhengdao ma? Buran, nimen ziyuan zuo fanzui zhe.”

Bei qifu de ren jiang dui jiao'ao de ren shuo:“Buran! Zhe shi nimen zhouye de jimou. Dangshi, nimen jiao women buyao xin zhenzhu, que wei ta shuli xuduo pidi.” Dang tamen kanjian xingfa de shihou, tamen biaoshi huihen. Wo yao ba jiasuo fang zai bu xindao zhe de bozi shang, tamen zhi shou tamen de xingwei de baochou
Mei feng wo paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshi qu, qizhong haohua de ren zong shi shuo:“Women dique bu xin ni de shiming.”
Tamen shuo:“Women caichan geng fu, er zi geng duo, women jianglai jue bu hui shou chengfa.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo. Dan zhongren daban bu zhidao.”
Nimen de caichan, nimen de erzi, dou buneng shi nimen shaoshao de qinjin wo; dan xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jiang yin tamen de xingwei er shou jiabei de baochou, tamen jiang anju yu lou shang
Jieli fandui wo de jixiang de renmen, jiang bei jujin zai xingfa zhong

Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu, dique yu shi nage puren de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi nage puren de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo. Nimen suo shishe de dongxi, ta jiang buchang ta; ta shi zui you de gongji zhe.”
Zai na ri, ta yao jiang tamen tongtong jihe qilai, ranhou dui tianshenmen shuo:“Zhexie ren chongbaiguo nimen ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Women zansong ni chaojue wanwu! Ni shi women de zhu, tamen bushi women de nupu. Tamen que shi chongbai jingling de, tamen daban xinyang jingling.”
Jinri, tamen buneng huli, ye buneng xiang hai; wo jiang dui bu yi de renmen shuo:“Nimen changshi nimen suo fouren de huoxing ba!”

Youren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingbai de jixiang shi, tamen shuo:“Zhege ren zhi xiang fang'ai nimen chongbai nimen de zuxian suo chongbai de ouxiang.” Tamen you shuo:“Zhe zhishi niezao de huangyan.” Dang zhenli lailin de shihou, bu xindao de renmen shuo:“Zhe zhishi yi zhong mingxian de moshu.”
Wo meiyou ba tamen suo neng song xi de renhe jingdian shangci tamen, zai ni zhiqian, wo meiyou paiqian renhe jinggao zhe qu jiaohua tamen
Zai tamen zhiqian shiqu de renmen ceng fouren zhenli, tamen meiyou dadao wo suo ciyu qian ren de shi fen zhi yi, dan qian ren fouren wo de shizhemen, wo de qianze shi zenyang de?§

Ni shuo:“Wo zhi yi yi jian shi quandao nimen, nimen yingdang wei zhenzhu er shuangshuang de huo dandu de zhan qilai, ranhou siwei.” Nimen de tongxiang, jue wu feng bing. Zai yanli de xingfa lailin zhiqian, ta dui nimen zhishi yige jinggao zhe
Ni shuo:“Wo bu xiang nimen suoqu shenme baochou, ta quan gui nimen; wo de baochou, zhi guizhenzhu fudan. Ta shi jianzheng wanwu de.”
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu, yi zhenli sheji xuwei, ta shi quanzhi youxuan de.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli yi lailinliao, xuwei jiang huanmie, er bu fuchu.”
Ni shuo:“Ruguo wo wu ru qitu, ze wo zi shou qi hai; ruguo wo zunxun zhengdao, ze youyu wo de zhu suo qishi de jingdian. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi linjin de.”
Jiaruo ni de jian dangshi tamen kongbu er wu chu taobi, zai yige linjin de difang bei daibu
Tamen jiang shuo:“Women yi xinyang tale.” Tamen zen neng cong yaoyuan di difang huode xinyang ne
Tamen yiqian bu xinyang ta, tamen cong yaoyuan di difang wang tan youxuan
tamen jiang yin zhang'ai er buneng huode tamen suo yuwang de. Youru tamen de tonglei yiqian shou zhang'ai yiyang, tamen que shi zai fannao de yilu zhong

Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu ──tiandi de chuangzao zhe! Ta shi mei ge tianshen juyou liangyi, huo san yi, huo si yi. Ta zai chuangzao zhong zengjia tasuo yu zengjia de. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de
Wulun zhenzhu shangci nimen shenme enhui, jue wu ren neng jiayi kouliu; wulun ta kouliu shenme enhui, zai kouliu zhihou, jue wu ren neng jiayi kaishi. Ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Renmen a! Nimen yingdang mingji zhenzhu suo ci nimen de enhui, chu zhenzhu wai, hai you she me chuangzao zhe neng cong tianshang dixia gongji nimen ma? Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, nimen zenme ruci beimiu ne
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai ni zhiqian de shizhemen, yi bei fourenle. Wanshi zhi guizhenzhu
Renmen a! Zhenzhu de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de, suoyi jue buyao rang jinshi de shenghuo qipian nimen, jue buyao rang hua zei yi zhenzhu de yourong qipian nimen
Emo que shi nimen de choudi, suoyi nimen yingdang ren ta wei choudi. Ta zhi haozhao ta de dangyu, yibian tamen zuo liehuo de jumin
Bu xindao zhe, jiang shou yanli de xingfa; xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang meng she youhe zhongda de baochou

Wei ziji de e xing suo mihuo, er ren e wei shan zhe,(neng yu zhenzhu suoyindao de yiyang ren ma?) Zhenzhu bi shi tasuo yiyu zhe wu ru mitu, bi shi tasuo yiyu zhe zunxun zhengdao, suo yi ni buyao wei aidao tamen er sangsheng, zhenzhu que shi quanzhi tamen de xingwei de
Zhen zhu shi feng qu xingqi yun lai, ranhou, ba yun gan zhi yige yi si de difang, er jie ta shi yi si de dadi fuhuo. Siren de fuhuo jiushi zheyang de
Yu de guangrong zhe, xuzhi guangrong quan guizhen zhu. Liangyan shangsheng dao ta nali, ta sheng qi shanxing. Tumoubugui zhe, jiang shou yanli de xingfa; zhexie ren de tumou, shi buneng decheng de

Zhen zhu chuangzao nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou, shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi jian bushi tasuo zhidao de; zengjia chang ming zhe de shou shu, jianshao duanming zhe de nianling, wu yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; na dui zhen zhu que shi rongyi de

Liang hai bu yiyang, zhe hai shi hen tian de, kekou de danshui, na hai shi hen ku de xian shui. Nimen ke chi mei yi haizhong suo chan de xinxian de rou, you ke cai nimen suo dai de shoushi. Ni kan chuanbo zai haishang polang er xing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui, yibian nimen ganxie ta
Ta shi heiye qinru baizhou, shi baizhou qinru heiye; ta zhifu ri yue, gezi yunxing zhi yi dingqi. Zhe shi zhenzhu ──nimen de zhu, guotu zhishi ta de, nimen she ta er qidao de, buneng guanli yi sihao

Ruguo nimen qidao tamen, tamen ting bujian nimen de qidao; jibian tingjianle, tamen ye buneng daying nimen; fuhuo ri, tamen jiang fouren nimen ceng yi tamen pei zhenzhu. Renhe ren buneng xiang che zhi zhe nayang gaosu ni.§
Renmen a! Nimen cai shi xuqiu zhenzhu de, zhenzhu que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiang huimie nimen, er chuangzao xin de zhongsheng
Na dui zhenzhu bushi fannan de

Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu bieren de zui; ruguo fuzhong zui zhe, jiao bieren lai ti ta fu zui, name, bieren sui shi ta de jinqin, ye buneng ti ta danfu yi sihao. Ni zhi neng jinggao zai mimi zhong jingwei zhu, qie jin shou bai gong zhe. Xidi shenxin zhe, zhi wei ziji er xidi. Zhenzhu shi weiyi de guisu

ni zhishi yige jinggao zhe
Wo que yi shi ni ben zhenli er wei baoxi zhe he jinggao zhe. Meiyou yige minzu ze yi, zhiyao you yige minzu, qizhong jiu you jinggao zhe cengjing shiqule
Ruguo tamen fouren ni, name, zai tamen zhiqian shiqu zhe, yi fourenle; tamen zu zhong de shizhe ceng zhaoshi tamen mingzheng, tian jing he canlan de jingdian
Ranhou, wo cheng fa liao buxindao zhe, wo de qianze shi zenyang de
Nandao ni hai bu zhidao ma? Zhenzhu cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, ranhou jie yushui er shengchan ge zhong guoshi. Shanshang you bai de, hong de, gese de tiaowen, he qihei de yanshi
Renlei, yeshou he shengchu zhong, ye tongyang di you butong de zhonglei. Zhenzhu de puren zhong, zhiyou xuezhe jingwei ta. Zhenzhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi she de
Songdu zhenzhu de jingdian, qie jin shou bai gong, bing mimi de huo gongkai di fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de caiwu zhe, tamen xiwang zhe jingying bu pochan
yibian ta shi tamen xiangshou ziji de wanquan de baochou, bing ba ta de enhui jia ci tamen; ta que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Wo suo qishi ni de, que shi zhenli, zu zheng yiqian de jingdian shi zhenshi de. Zhenzhu duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Ranhou, wo shi wo suo jianxuan de pu renmen jicheng jingdian; tamen zhong you zi qi de, you zhong he de, you feng zhenzhu de mingling er zhengxian xingshan de. Na que shi hong en

Bu xindao de renmen, yingdang shou xingfa de panjue.”

Jingwei zhu zhe jiang yi dui yi dui di bei yao ru leyuan, dai tamen lai dao leyuan qianmian de shihou, yuan men kaile, guan yuan de tianshen yao dui tamen shuo:“Zhu nimen ping'an! Nimen yijing chunjiele, suoyi qing nimen jinqu yong ju ba!”
Tamen shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta dui women shijianle ta de yue yan, ta shi women jicheng letu, women zai leyuan zhong suiyi juzhu. Gongzuo zhe de baochou zhen youmei!”
Ni jiang jian zhong tianshen huanrao zai baozuo de sizhou, songyang tamen de zhu, tamen jiang bei binggong caipan. Yao shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu!”§
Ha yi, mi mu
Zhe bu jingdian jiang zi wanneng quanzhi de zhu ──
she you zuiguo, zhun ren chanhui, yanli chengfa, bo shi enhui de zhu. Chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de; ta que shi zuihou de guisu
Zhiyou buxindao zhe, wei zhenzhu de jixiang er zhenglun. Ni buyao bei tamen zai ge chengshi de wanglai suo mihuo

Zai tamen zhiqian, nu ha de zongzu, he houlai de ge minzu, ceng fouren zhong shizhe, ge minzu dou yu jiahai ben zu de shizhe; tamen ju miu wang er zhenglun, yu jie ci bodao zhenli, guwo chengzhile tamen. Wo de xingfa shi zenyang de
Buxindao zhe dang zheyang shou ni de zhu de panjue, tamen shi juzhu huo yu de

Zhichi baozuo de he huanrao baozuo de dou zansong tamen de zhu, dou gui xin ta, dou wei xindao zhe qiurao, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Zai enhui fangmian he zhijue fangmian, ni shi baoluo wanwu de, qiu ni she you huiguo zi xin, erqie zunxun ni de zhengdao zhe. Qiu ni baohu tamen, mian shou huo yu de xingfa
Women de zhu a! Qiu ni shi tamen he tamen de xingshan de zuxian, qizi he zisun, yitong jinru ni suo yingxu tamen de yongjiu de leyuan. Ni que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de
Qiu ni shi tamen de mian yu xingfa. Zai na ri, ni shi shei de mian yu xingfa, ni yi ci minle shei, na que shi weida de chenggong.”
Bu xindao zhe, biding yao bei zhaohuan shuo:“Zhenzhu tonghen nimen, shenzhi nimen tonghen zishen, yinwei nimen ceng bei zhao zhi zhengxin, dan nimen bu xin.”
Tamen yao shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni shi women si liang ci, ni shi women sheng liang ci, gu women chengren women de zuiguole. Hai neng you yitiao chulu ma?”
Zhe shi yinwei qidao zhenzhu de shihou, nimen fourenle ta de du yi; ruguo yi wu pei ta, nimen jiu chengren na shi heli de, gu panjue zhi guizhenzhu ──zhizun zhi da de zhu
Ta xianshi nimen ta de jixiang, ta wei nimen cong yun zhong jiangxia jiyang; zhiyou guiyi zhe neng juewu
Nimen dang qidao zhenzhu, er chengxin shunfu ta, jishi bu xindao zhe bu yuanyi
Ta shi zhizun de, shi you baozuo de, ta yao ba cong ta de mingling zhong fachu de qishi, shouyu tasuo yiyu de puren, yibian ta jinggao zhongren yi xiang hui zhi ri ──

Ni yingdang yi linjin zhi ri jinggao tamen, na shi tamen de xin jiang sheng dao yanhou, ta manfu youchou. Bu yi zhe, jiang meiyou renhe qinyou, ye meiyou zouxiao de shuo qing zhe
Ta zhidao touyan he xinshi
Zhenzhu ben zhenli er caipan. Tamen she ta er chongbai de, bu feng renhe wu er caipan. Zhen zhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de.§

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, yi guancha qian ren de jieju shi zenyang de ma? Qian ren bi tamen shili geng da, chengji geng duo; dan zhen zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er chengzhile tamen, tamen dui zhen zhu meiyou renhe baowei zhe
Na shi yinwei wo de zhong shizhe ceng daizhe xuduo mingzheng lailin tamen, dan tamen bu gui xin, gu zhen zhu chengfale tamen. Ta que shi zhi gang de, ta de xingfa que shi yanli de
wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de jixiang he mingzheng
qu jiaohua falao, ha man he ge lun, dan tamen shuo:“Ta shi miu wang de shushi.”
Ta xianshi tamen cong wo zheli fachu de zhenli de shihou, tamen shuo:“Nimen dang shalu yu ta yitong xindao zhe de erzi, er baoquan tamen de nu'er.” Bu xindao zhe de jice, zhi zai mi wu zhong
Falao shuo:“Nimen rang wo sha si mu sa! Jiao ta qidao ta de zhu qu ba! Wo dique pa ta gaibian nimen de zongjiao, huo zai guonei zuoluan.”
Mu sa shuo:“Wo que yi qiu bi yu wo de zhu, yi ji nimen de zhu, mian zao bu xin qingsuan ri de yiqie zi da zhe de qinhai.”

Falao zu zhong yige mimi gui xin de xinshi shuo:“Yige ren ji yi nimen de zhu fachu de ruogan mingzheng zhaoshi nimen zhihou, yinwei ta shuo,‘wo de zhu shi zhenzhu’, nimen jiu yao shalu ta ma? Ruguo ta shi yige shuohuang zhe, name, ta zi shou huangyan zhi hai; ruguo ta shi yige chengshi zhe, name, tasuoyong yi donghe nimen de zainan, jiang you yibufen lailin nimen, zhenzhu biding bu yindao guofen de chang shuohuangyan zhe

Wo de zongzu a! Jinri guo quan zhi gui nimen, er nimen zai guo zhong chengxiong. Ruguo zhenzhu de xingfa lailin, name, shei zhu women dikang ta ne?” Falao shuo:“Wo zhi yi wo de zhuzhang zhishi nimen, wo zhi yindao nimen zou shang zhengdao.”
Xindao zhe shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Wo dique pa nimen zaoyu qian ren suo zaoyu de zainan
ru nu ha de zongzu, a de ren, sai mo de ren, yiji zai tamen zhihou de ren suo zaoshou de zaihuo yiyang. Zhenzhu shi bu yu kui wang zhong pu de
Wo de zongzu a! Wo dique wei nimen danxin huxiang hujiao zhi ri
zai na ri, nimen jiang zhuanshen tui hou, er meiyou renhe baohu zhe neng shi nimen bu shou zhenzhu de chengfa. Zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, shei meiyou xiangdao

Yiqian you su fu que yi jiang xuduo mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, dan nimen dui ta suo zhaoshi nimen de mingzheng, yiran zai yihuo zhong, zhidao ta siqu de shihou, nimen hai shuo:‘Zai ta zhihou, zhenzhu jue bu hui zai paiqian renhe shizhe.’ Zhenzhu zheyang shi guofen de huaiyi zhe mi wu.”
Meiyou zhenpingshiju, er zhenglun zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, ju zhenzhu he zhong xinshi kan lai, shi hen taoyan de. Zhenzhu zheyang fengbi yiqie zi da de gao'ao zhe de xin
Falao shuo:“Ha man a! Ni wei wo jianzao yizuo gaolou, huoxu wo neng zhaodao ruogan xiansuo ──

tianshang de xiansuo, er kuijian mu sa de shenling; wo dique caixiang ta shi yige shuo huang zhe.” Falao de e xing, zheyang mihuole ta ziji, fang'aile ta zou shang zhengdao. Falao de jice, zhi guiyu huimie
Nage gui xinzhe you shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen shuncong wo, wo jiu ba nimen yin shang zhengdao
Wo de zongzu a! Jinshi de shenghuo, zhishi yi zhong xiangshou, houshi cai shi anzhai
Zuo'e zhe zhi shou tongyang de e bao; xingshan erqie xindao de nanzi he nuzi, jiang ru leyuan, shou wuliang de gongji.§
Wo de zongzu a! Zenme wo zhao nimen yu de du, er nimen que zhao wo yu huo yu ne

Qishi, nimen zhao wo qu chongbai de dongxi, zai jinshi he houshi, dou buneng yingda renhe qidao. Women de guisu shi zhenzhu, guofen zhe bi shi huo yu de jumin
Nimen jianglai yao huiyi wo dui nimen shuo dehua. Wo ba wo de shiqing weituo zhenzhu, zhenzhu que shi mingcha zhong pu de.”
Zhenzhu baohu ta mian zao tamen suo jimou de huohai, bing yi yanxing jiang yu falao de zongzu
tamen zhaoxi shou huoxing. Fuhuo shi lailin zhi ri, huozhe jiang shuo:“Nimen shi falao de zongzu jinqu shou zui yanli de xingfa ba!”
Na shi tamen zai huo yu zhong huxiang zhenglun, nuoruo zhe dui zi da zhe shuo:“Women que yi zuoguo nimen de shuncong zhe, nimen neng ti women jiechu yibufen huoxing ma?”
Zi da zhe shuo:“Women dajia dique dou zai huo yu zhong, zhenzhu que yi ti zhong pu panjuele.”
Zai huo yu li de ren dui guanli huo yu de tianshen shuo:“Qing nimen qidao nimen de zhu, qiu ta gei women jianqing yi ri de xingfa.”
Tamen shuo:“Nandao nimen zu zhong de shizhe, meiyou zhaoshi nimen ruogan mingzheng ma?” Tamen shuo:“Buran!” Tianshenmen shuo:“Nimen qidao ba! Dan bu xindao zhe de qidao zhi zai mi wu zhong.”
Wo biding yuanzhu wo de zhong shizhe he zhong xinshi, zai jinshi shenghuo zhong he zai zhong jianzheng qili zhi ri ──
ji bu yi zhe de tuoci wu bi yu tamen zhi ri, tamen jiang zao qi jue, tamen jiang shou houshi de xingfa
Wo que yi jiang zhengdao ciyu mu sa, wo que yi shi yiselie de houyi jicheng tian jing
yong zuo you xinling de xiangdao he jiaohui
Gu ni dang jianren, zhenzhu de yingxu, que shi zhenshi de. Ni yingdang wei ni de guoshi er qiurao, ni yingdang zhaoxi zansong ni de zhu

Meiyou zhenpingshiju er zhenglun zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, tamen de xiongzhong, dique zhiyou yige niantou, jiushi yao xiang dadao tamen jue buneng dadao de weida. Gu ni dang qiu bi yu zhenzhu, ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Chuangzao tiandi, shi bi zaizao renlei geng nan de, dan shiren daban bu zhidao
Wu yan zhe yu you yan zhe shi bu xiangdeng de; xindao erqie xingshan zhe yu zuo'e zhe yeshi bu xiangdeng de, dan nimen hen shao juewu
Fuhuo shi biding lailin, zhe shi hao wuyi yi de; dan zhongren daban buxin
Nimen de zhu shuo:“Nimen yao qidao wo, wo jiu yingda nimen; bu ken chongbai wo de ren, tamen jiang beijian de ru huo yu.”
Zhenzhu wei nimen chuangzao heiye, yibian nimen anxi; chuangzao baizhou, yibian nimen guankan; zhenzhu duiyu renlei, que shi you enhui de, dan renlei daban bu ganxie
Na shi zhenzhu, shi nimen de zhu, shi wanwu de chuangzao zhe, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Nimen zenme ruci beimiu ne
Fouren zhenzhu de jixiang zhe, jiushi zheyang beimiu de

Zhenzhu wei nimen yi dimian wei ju chu, yi tiankong wei fangwu, ta yi xingxiang fuyu nimen, er shi nimen de xingxiang youmei, ta gongji nimen jiamei de shipin. Na shi zhenzhu, nimen de zhu. Duo fu zai zhenzhu!──Quan shijie de zhu
Ta que shi yongsheng de, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, gu nimen dang qidao ta, er chengxin di shunfu ta. Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu ──quan shijie de zhu!§

Ni shuo:“Dang xuduo mingzheng cong wo de zhu lailin wo de shihou, wo que yi feng dao jinling, bu zhun wo chongbai nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de; wo que yi feng dao mingling, jiao wo shunfu quan shijie de zhu.”

Ta chuangzao nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ji yong xiekuai, ranhou shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou rang nimen chengnian, ranhou rang nimen bian cheng laoren ──nimen zhong you yaozhe de ──ranhou, rang nimen huo dao yige dingqi, yibian nimen mingli
Ta neng shi rensheng, neng shi ren si. Dang ta panjue yi jian shi de shihou, ta zhi dui na jian shi shuo:“You”, ta jiu youle
Ni wei jian zhenglun zhenzhu de jixiang zhe zenyang beimiu ma
Tamen fouren tian jing, fouren wo jiang shizhong shizhe de jixiang, tamen bujiu hui zhidao (houguo de)

Dang tamen zu zhong de zhong shizhe zhaoshi tamen xuduo mingzheng de shihou, tamen yin ziji suoyou de xuewen er yangyang deyi, tamen suo chaoxiao de xingfa, sui jianglin tamen
Dang tamen kanjian wo de xingfa de shihou, tamen shuo:“Women zhi xin zhen zhu, buxin women suoyong yi pei ta de.”

Tamen bu na tian ke, buxin houshi

Fan shuoguo “women de zhu shi zhenzhu”, ranhou zunxun zhengdao zhe, zhong tianshen jiang lailin tamen, shuo:“Nimen buyao kongju, buyao youchou, nimen yingdang wei nimen bei yu xu de leyuan er gaoxing
Zai jinshi he houshi, women dou shi nimen de baohu zhe. Nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo aihao de yiqie, nimen zai leyuan li jiang xiangshou nimen suo yaoqiu de yiqie
Na shi zhiren zhi ci de zhu suo ci de yan xiang.”
Zhao ren xinyang zhenzhu, li xingshan gong, bingqie shuo:“Wo que shi musilin” de ren, zai yanci fangmian, you shei bi ta geng youmei ne
Shan e bushi yilu de. Ni yingdang yi zui youmei de pinxing qu duifu elie de pinxing, name, yu ni xiang chou zhe, huran jian hui bian de qin ru miyou
Wei jianren zhe, huo ci meide, wei you dafu fen zhe, huo ci meide
Ruguo emo songyong ni, ni yingdang qiu bi yu zhenzhu. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de
Zhouye yu ri yue dou shi ta de jixiang. Nimen buyao xiang ri yue koutou, nimen yingdang xiang chuangzao naxie jixiang de zhenzhu koutou, ruguo nimen shi chongbai ta dehua
Ruguo tamen zi da, name, zai ni de zhu nali de zhong tianshen, ze shi zhouye zansong ta, tamen bing buyanjuan.※

Ni kan dadi shi ganku de, dang wo jiangxia yushui de shihou, ta bian huodong er pengzhang qilai, zhe yeshi ta de jixiang. Neng shi dadi fuhuo zhe, bi neng shi siren fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de

Qujie wo de jixiang zhe, bi buneng yinni qilai, bu rang wo kanjian tamen. Shi zai fuhuo ri bei touru huo yu zhe geng gui ne? Haishi zai fuhuo ri anquan er lai zhe geng gui ne? Nimen yao zuo shenme, jiu suibian zuo shenme ba! Ta que shi mingcha nimen de xingwei de
Jiaohui yi jianglin hai bu gui xinzhe,(wo yao chengfa tamen). Na jiaohui que shi jiangu de jingdian
Xuwei buneng cong ta de qianhou jingong ta, ta shi cong zhi rui de, ke song de zhu jiang shi de
Renmen dui ni shuo de, buguo shi yiwang dui zhong shizhe shuoguo de lanyan, ni de zhu, que shi you she you de, que shi you tong cheng de

Jiaruo wo jiang shi yi bu waiguoyu de “gulanjing”, tamen biding hui shuo:“Zenme bu jieshi qizhong de jie wen ne? Yi bu waiguoyu de jingdian he yige alabo de xianzhi ma?” Ni shuo:“Ta shi xindao zhe de xiangdao he yaofang; buxindao zhe ting'erbuwen, shi'erbujian, yinwei zhexie ren shi cong yuan chu bei hanjiao de.”

Wo que yi ba tian jing shouyu mu sa, dan zhongren wei neitian jing er fenqi, jiaruo meiyou yiju hua cong ni de zhu yuxian fachu, tamen bi shou caipan. Tamen duiyu ta, que shi zai shi ren youyu de yilu zhi zhong
Xingshan zhe zi shou qi yi, zuo'e zhe zi shou qi hai. Ni de zhu jue bu hui kui wang zhong pu de

Guanyu fuhuo shi de renshi, zhi guiyu ta; guoshi de tuo e, nuxing de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi buzai ta de dong jian zhong. Zai na ri, ta jiang wen tamen:“Nimen suo cheng wei wo de huoban de, zai nali ne?” Tamen jiang shuo:“Women baogao ni, women zhong jue meiyou yige ren neng zuozheng zhe jian shi.”
Tamen shengqian suo qidao de, jiang huibi tamen, tamen jiang quexin ziji wu suo tao zui
Ren qifu bu yan, yi zao huohuan jiu huixin juewang

Ta zaoyu huannan zhihou, ruguo wo shi ta changshi cong wo jiangxia de enhui, ta biding shuo:“Zhe shi wo yong gongzuo huan lai de. Wo buxin fuhuo shi hui daolai. Ruguo wo bei zhao qu jian wo de zhu, ze wo zai ta nali bi shou zhi shan de baochou.” Wo bi jiang bu xindao zhe de xingwei gaosu tamen, wo bi shi tamen changshi yanzhong de xingfa
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta wang'en er zi da; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta qidao bu jue
Ni shuo:“Nimen gaosu wo ba! Ruguo “gulanjing” shi cong zhenzhu nali jiang shi de, er nimen bu xin ta, name, you shei bi changyuan weibei zhenli zhe geng mi wu ne?”
Wo jiang zai sifang he zai tamen zishen zhong, ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen, zhidao tamen mingbai “gulanjing” que shi zhenli. Nandao ni de zhu neng jianzheng wanwu hai bugou ma
Zhen de, tamen dique huaiyi jianglai shifou yao yu tamen de zhu huimian. Zhen de, ta que shi zhouzhi wanwu de
Ha yi, mi mu
a ni, xi ni, jia fu
Wanneng de, zhi rui de zhenzhu, zheyang qishi ni he ni yiqian de zhong xianzhi
Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de; ta que shi zhizun de, que shi zhi da de
Zhu tianti jihu cong shangmian polie, zhong tianshen zansong tamen de zhu, bing wei dimian shang de ren qiurao. Zhen de, zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de
She zhenzhu er ze qu baohu zhe de ren, zhenzhu shi jianshi tamen de. Ni jue bushi tamen de jianhu zhe

Wo zheyang qishi ni yi ben alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian ni jinggao shou yi ji qi sizhou de jumin, yibian ni yugao hao wuyi yi de jihe ri. Yibufen ren jiang zai leyuan zhong, yibufen ren jiang zai liehuo zhong
Jiaruo zhenzhu yiyu, ta bi shi tamen xinfeng tongyi de zongjiao, dan ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe ru yu ta de enhui zhong; bu yi de renmen, jue wu baohu zhe, ye wu yuanzhu zhe
Tamen zenme she ta er ze qu baohu zhe ne? Zhenzhu cai shi baohu zhe, ta neng shi sizhe fuhuo, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Wulun nimen zhenglun shenme shi, dou yao guizhenzhu panjue. Na shi zhen zhu, shi wo de zhu, wo zhi xintuo ta, wo zhi guiyi ta

Ta shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, ta yi nimen de tonglei wei nimen de qizi; shi nimen de shengchu tonglei xiangpei; ta jie ci shi nimen fanzhi. Renhe wu bushi xiang ta. Ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Tiandi de baozang, zhishi ta de; ta yu shi shei de jiyang kuanyu, jiu shi ta kuanyu; yu shi shei de jiyang jiongpo, jiu shi ta jiongpo; ta shi quanzhi wanwu de.§

Ta yi wei nimen zhiding zhengjiao, jiushi tasuo mingling nu ha de, tasuo qishi ni de, ta mingling yi bo la xin, mu sa he er sa de zongjiao. Nimen yingdang jin shouzhengjiao, buyao wei zhengjiao er fen men bie hu. Yi wu pei zhu de renmen, yi wei ni suo jiaodao tamen de shi shi nankan di. Zhenzhu jiang tasuo yiyu zhe zhaozhi yu zheng jiao, jiang guiyi ta zhe yindao yu zhenli

Zhishi lailin tamen hou, tamen cai wei huxiang jidu er fen paibie. Jiaruo bu shi yinwei ni de zhu yi yuxian shuoguo yao yanqi chengzhi, name, tamen bi yi shou caipanle. Zai tamen zhihou jicheng tian jing de renmen, duiyu tian jing, dique zai shi ren youyu de yihuo zhong

Ni yingdang zhao ren yu ci dao, ni yingdang jin zun tianming, chang shou zhengdao, buyao shuncong tamen de siyu. Ni shuo:“Wo quexin zhenzhu suo jiang shi de jingdian, wo fengming gongping daiyu nimen. Zhenzhu shi women de zhu, yeshi nimen de zhu. Women you women de gongzuo, nimen you nimen de gongzuo, women bubi he nimen bianbo. Zhenzhu jiang jihe women, ta shi weiyi de guisu.”
Zhongren ji ying zhao er xinfeng zhenzhu de zongjiao hou, wei ta er bianbo zhe, ju tamen de zhu kan lai, tamen de zhengju shi wuxiao de, tamen yingdang zao qian nu, bing shou yanxing
Zhenzhu jiang shi baohan zhenli de jingdian, bing jiang shi gongping. Ni zenme neng zhidao ne? Fuhuo shi huoxu shi linjin de

Buxin fuhuo shi de renmen yaoqiu ta zaori shixian; er quexin ta de renmen que pa ta zaori shixian, bingqie zhidao ta shi zhenshi de. Zhen de, wei fuhuo shi'er zhengbian de renmen, dique zai bu jin qingli de mi wu zhi zhong
Zhenzhu shi ci'ai ta de zhong pu de, ta gongji tasuo yu gongji de ren, ta que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de
Shei yu de houshi de shouhuo, wo jiu jia zeng shei de shouhuo; shei yu de jinshi de shouhuo, wo jiu gei shei yidian jinshi de shouhuo; ta zai houshi, meiyou fen er
Nandao tamen you xuduo pei zhu, ceng wei tamen zhiding zhenzhu suo wei xuke de zongjiao ma? Jiaruo meiyou na pan ci, tamen bi shou panjue, bu yi de renmen, bi shou tongku de xingfa

Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi de renmen wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er kongju, naxie zui'e de chengfa biding lailin tamen. Xindao erqie xingshan de renmen, jianglai yao juzhu zai leyuan de shengdi zhong, zai tamen de zhu nali, tamen de xiangshou tamen suo yu xiangshou de; na que shi hong en

Na shi zhenzhu yong lai xiang ta naxie xindao erqie xingshan de pu renmen baoxi de. Ni shuo:“Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu baochou, dan qiu wei tongzu er qin'ai.” Shei xing yi jian shanshi, wo yao jiabei di baochou shei. Zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi shan bao de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Ta jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er niezao.” Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, ta jiu fengbi ni de xin. Zhenzhu yi qi wenci mosha xuwei, zhengshi zhenli, ta que shi quanzhi xinshi de
Ta zhunxu ta de zhong pu huiguo, ta raoshu yiqie zui'e, ta zhidao nimen de xingwei
Ta daying xindao erqie xingshan zhe de qidao, ta yi endian jia ci tamen. Bu xindao zhe jiang shou yanli de xingfa.§

Ruguo zhenzhu shi ta de pu renmen de xiangshou kuanyu de jiyang, tamen bi zai da dishang zuo'e; dan ta yi dingliang er jiangxia tasuo yu jiang de jiyang. Ta duiyu ta de pu renmen, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Ta zai tamen juewang zhihou, jiangxia shi yu, guang shile ta de enhui, ta que shi baohu zhe, que shi ke song de
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi chuangzao tiandi he ta zai tiandi jian suo sanbu de ge zhong dongwu, ta neng ziyou de jiang tamen jihe
Fan nimen suo zaoyu de zainan, dou shi youyu nimen suozuo de zui'e; ta raoshu nimen de xuduo zuiguo
Nimen zai da dishang jue buneng taobi tianqian, chu zhenzhu wai, nimen meiyou renhe baohu zhe he yuanzhu zhe
Ta de jixiang zhi yi, shi zai haizhong xiang shanyue yiban de chuanbo
Ruguo ta yiyu, ta jiu shi feng jingzhi, er chuanbo tingdun zai haimian shang. Duiyu mei ge jianren zhe, ganxie zhe, qizhong que you xuduo jixiang
Ta huo yin tamen suozuo de zui'e, er shi naxie chuanbo chenmo; ta shu rao xuduo ren de zuiguo
Wei wo de jixiang er zhenglun de renmen, zhidao tamen ziji jue wu chu tao zui
Fan nimen suo shou ci de, wulun shenme, dou shi jinshi shenghuo de xiangshou. Zai zhenzhu nali de baochou, shi geng youmei de, shi geng changjiu de, na shi guiyu xindao er zhi xintuo zhenzhu zhe
ye guiyu yuanli dazui he choushi, qie zai fanu shi neng she you zhe
ye guiyu yingda zhu de haozhao, qie jin shou bai gong zhe; tamen de shiwu shi you xieshang er jueding de, tamen fen she wo suo ciyu tamen de
ye guiyu neng fankang ziji suo zao de qinhai zhe
E xing ying de tongyang de e bao. Shei yuan shu rao erqie hejie, zhenzhu bi baochou shei. Zhenzhu que shi bu xi'ai bu yi zhe de
Shou ren qiwu er jinxing baofu de renmen, shi wu ke zebei de
Ying shou zebei de, shi qiwu taren, bingqie zai difang shang manheng wuli zhe; zhexie ren jiang shou tongku de xingfa
Fan neng renshou er jiayi she you zhe, tamen di na zhong xingwei, que shi yinggai juexin zuo de shiqing
Zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, zai zhenzhu de qi juehou, shei meiyou renhe baohu zhe. Ni jianglai yao kanjian bu yi zhe yanjian xingfa shi shuo:“Hai you fanhui (chenshi) de tujing ma?”

Ni jianglai yao kanjian tamen shen lin huoxing, wei beijian er gongjing, anzhong tou kan. Xindao zhe jiang shuo:“Kui she de renmen, zai fuhuo ri que shi sangshi zishen he jiashu de.” Zhen de, bu yi zhe bi zai yongheng de xingfa zhong
Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen jiang meiyou renhe pengyou yuanzhu tamen. Zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, shei meiyou daolu
Zai buke kangju zhi ri, cong zhenzhu jianglin yiqian, nimen yingdang yingda nimen de zhu. Zai na ri, nimen jue meiyou taobi di difang, ye jue buneng dilai

Ruguo tamen tuibi, name, wo meiyou pai ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe, ni zhi fu tongzhi de zeren. Wo shi renlei changshi cong wo fachu de enhui de shihou, tamen yin enhui er kuaile; tamen yinwei cengjing fanzui er zaonan de shihou, renlei que shi gu en de
Tiandi de guo quan, guizhenzhu suoyou. Ta yu chuangzao shenme, jiu chuangzao shenme; yu gei shei nuhai, jiu gei shei nuhai; yu gei shei nanhai, jiu gei shei nanhai
huo shi tamen jian sheng nanhai he nuhai; ta shi tasuo yiyu zhe, chengwei buneng shengyu de. Ta que shi quanzhi de, que shi quanneng de.§
Renhe ren ye bupei yu zhenzhu duihua, chufei qishi, huo cong weimu de houmian, huo pai yige shizhe, feng ta de mingling er qishi tasuo yu qishi de. Ta que shi zhizun de, que shi zhi rui de

Wo zheyang qishi ni cong wo de mingling zhong fachu de jingshen. Ni benlai bu zhidao tian jing shi shenme, zhengxin shi shenme; dan wo yi tian jing wei guangming, er jie ci guangming yindao wo suo yu yindao de puren. Ni que shi zhishi zhenglu zhe
Na shi zhenzhu de lu. Tiandi wanwu, dou shi ta de. Zhen de, wanshi zhi guizhen zhu
Ha yi, mi mu
Yi mingbai de jingdian mengshi
wo que yi yi ci wei alabo wen de “gulanjing”, yibian nimen liaojie
Zai wo nali de tian jing yuanben zhong, ta que shi gaoshang de, que shi ruizhi de
Nandao yinwei nimen shi guofen de minzhong, wo jiu shi nimen bude shou jiaoxun ma
Wo ceng paiqian xuduo xianzhi qu jiaohua gudai de minzu
mei you xianzhi lailin tamen de shihou, tamen dou jiayi yunong
Wo ceng huimiele bi ni de zongzu geng qiangheng zhe, xian min de shili yi shiqule
Ruguo ni wen tamen:“Shei chuangzaole tiandi?” Tamen biding shuo:“Wanneng de, quanzhi de zhu chuangzaole tiandi.”
Ta wei nimen yi dadi wei anxi zhi suo, ta wei nimen zai da dishang kaipi xuduo daolu, yibian nimen dadao luxing de mudi de
Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia you dingliang de yushui, jie yushui er shi yi si di difang fuhuo. Nimen jianglai yao zheyang cong fenmu zhong bei qu chulai
Ta chuangzao wan lei, er yi chuanbo he shengchu gong nimen qi cheng

yibian nimen duan zuo zai shangmian. Ranhou, zai duan zuo de shihou, xiangzhe nimen zhu de endian, bingqie shuo:“Zansong zhen zhu, chaojue wanwu! Ta wei women zhifu ci wu, women duiyu ta ben shi wuneng de
Women biding guiyu women de zhu.”
Tamen ba ta de yibufen puren, dang zuo ta de fenzi; ren que shi mingxian de gu en zhe
Nandao ta cong ziji suo chuangzao de zhongsheng zhong zi qu nu'er, er yi nan'er zhuan gui nimen ma
tamen wangyan zhiren zhu you nu'er, dan tamen zhong de yige ren ting shuo ziji de qi zi sheng nu'er de shihou, ta de lianse bian cheng andan de, erqie ta shi ao nu de
Shengzhang zai zhuangshi zhong, qie buneng xiongbian zhe, nandao tamen yi ta guizhen zhu ma

Zhong tianshen ben shi zhenzhu de nupu, tamen que yi zhong tianshen wei nuxing. Tamen ceng jianzheng zhenzhu chuangzao zhong tianshen ma? Tamen de jianzheng jiang bei jilu xialai, tamen ye jiang bei shenwen
Tamen shuo:“Jiaruo zhiren zhu yiyu, women shi bu hui chongbai tamen de.” Tamen duiyu ci shuo, hao wu renshi; tamen zhi zai shuohuang hua
Nandao yiqian wo ceng ci tamen yi ben tian jing, er tamen shi jianchi na ben tian jing de
Buran, tamen shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji er de zhengdao de.”

Zai ni zhiqian, mei feng wo zheyang paiqian jinggao zhe dao yige chengshi qu, nali de haohua zhe zong shi shuo:“Women que yi faxian women de zuxian shi xinfeng yi zhong zongjiao de, women que shi zunxun tamen de yiji de.”

Ta shuo:“Jishi wo xianshi nimen yi zhong bi nimen zuxian de zongjiao geng wei chongzheng de zongjiao, nimen hai yao zuncong nimen de zuxian ma?” Tamen shuo:“Women que shi buxin nimen suo feng de shiming.”
Guwo chengfale tamen, ni kan kan fouren zhengdao zhe de jieju shi zenyang de
Dangshi, yi bo la xin dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Wo yu nimen suo chongbai de, que shi meiyou guanxi de
wei chuangzao wo de zhu ze buran, ta biding yao yindao wo.”
Ta jiang zhe ju hua liu zeng ta de houyi, yibian tamen huiwu
Buran, wo shi zhexie ren he tamen de zuxian xiangshou, zhidao zhenli jianglin, ji xuandao de shizhe dansheng
Zhenli jianglin tamen de shihou, tamen shuo:“Zhe shi moshu, women biding buxin ta.”
Tamen shuo:“Zenme bu ba zhe ben “gulanjing” jiang shi liang chengzhong renhe yi cheng de yao ren ne?”

Nandao tamen neng fenpei ni de zhu de enhui ma? Wo jiang tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shengji fenpei ji tamen, wo shi tamen bici xiangcha ruogan ji, yibian tamen ceng ceng jiezhi. Ni de zhu de enhui bi tamen suo jixu de geng youmei
Ruo bushi wei fang shiren bian wei yi jiao, wo bi shi bu xin zhiren zhu de renmen de fangwu bian cheng you yin ding de, he yin ti de, yibian tamen denglin qi shang
bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you yin men he yin chuang de, yibian tamen yan wochuang shang
bing jiang tamen de fangwu bian cheng you jinshi de. Naxie wufei shi jin shi shenghuo de xiangshou; zai ni de zhu nali de houshi, shi zhuan gui jingwei zhe de
Shei yaoshi wushi zhiren zhu de jiaohui, wo jiu rang yige emo fu zai shei de shenshang, chengwei ta de pengyou
Naxie emo, fang'ai tamen zunxun zhengdao, er tamen que yiwei ziji shi zunxun zhengdao de
Dai wushi zhe lai dao wo nali de shihou, ta dui ta de pengyou shuo:“Dan yuan wo he ni zhi jian, you dongxi liang fang de juli, ni zhe pengyou zhen elie!”
Nimen ceng xing bu yi, suoyi jinri zhe zhong yuanwang duiyu nimen jue wu biyi. Yinwei nimen yao tong shou xingfa
Nandao ni neng shi longzi tingwen, huo neng yindao xiazimen he zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de ren ma
Ruguo wo shi ni qi shi, name, wo jianglai biding yao chengfa tamen
she huo wo yao zhaoshi ni wo suoyong yi jinggao tamen de xingfa, name, wo dui tamen, que shi quanneng de
Suoyi ni yingdang jianchi ni suo shou de qishi, ni que shi zai zhengdao shang de
“Gulanjing” que shi ni he ni de zongzu de rongyu, nimen jianglai yao bei shenwen
Ni wen wen zai ni zhiqian suo paiqian de zhong shizhe, wo ceng fou zai zhiren zhu zhi wai zhiding xuduo shenling gong ren chongbai
Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang, qu jiaohua falao he ta de guizumen, ta shuo:“Wo que shi quan shijie de zhu de shizhe.”
Dang ta ba wo de xuduo jixiang zhaoshi tamen de shihou, tamen like chaoxiao naxie jixiang
Wo suo zhaoshi tamen de jixiang, yi jian bi yi jian da. Wo ceng yi xingfa chengzhi tamen, yibian tamen huiwu
Tamen ceng shuo:“Shushi a! Qing ni wei women qidao ni de zhu, yinwei ta ceng yu ni ding yue de yuangu, women biding yao zunxun zhengdao.”
Dang wo jiechu tamen suo zao de xingfa de shihou, tamen like shuangyue
Falao ceng hanjiao ta de baixing shuo:“Wo de baixing a! Misi er (aiji) de guo quan, he zai wo xia benliuzhe de zhexie jianghe, bu dou shi wo de ma? Nandao nimen kan bujian
Nandao wo bushi bi zhe beijian erqie hanhu de ren geng qiang ma
Zenme meiyou huangjin de shouzhuo, jia zai ta de shou shang ne? Huozhe you zhong tianshen tong ta jiezhong jianglin ne?”
Ta ceng gudong ta de baixing, tamen jiu fucong ta; tamen que shi beini zhe
Dang tamen chufan wo de shihou, wo chengzhi tamen, gu shi tamen tongtong yan si
wo yi tamen wei houshi de jianjie.§
Dang mai er yan de erzi bei ju wei li de shihou, ni de zongzu like xuan hua
tamen shuo:“Women de zhong shenling geng hao ne? Haishi ta geng hao ne?” Tamen zhishi wei qiangciduoli er ju ta wei li, buran, tamen shi hao bian de minzhong
Ta zhishi yige puren, wo ci ta endian, bing yi ta wei yiselie houyi de shifan
Jiaruo wo yiyu, wo bi she nimen er chuangzao xuduo tianshen, zai da dishang jicheng nimen
Ta que shi fuhuo shi de yuzhao, nimen qie mo huaiyi ta, nimen yingdang shuncong wo, zhe shi zhenglu
Jue buyao rang emo fang'ai nimen, ta que shi nimen de ming di
